programme.title: Salvage Hunters: The Restorers
programme.desc: Expert craftsmen are bringing Drew Pritchards finds back to life and restore them to their former glory. Drew hunts for treasures such as derelict gems and forgotten remnants across the country. And then he and his team do the restoration turning trash to gold, so that worn objects become shining gems for which Drews customers want to pay a lot of money. All kinds of items can and will be restored, starting from a century-old suitcase to an ancient coffee machine, from a ravaged carousel horse to a large railway clock.

programme.title: Junk Gypsies
programme.desc: The Junk Gypsies transform a living room for a Texas ranching family into a colorful space the whole family can enjoy. They shop at local junk stores for interesting items they can re-purpose, pull out their shotgun to make a country-chic lighting fixture and turn an old drum into a storage bin. The Junk Gypsies tackle this make-over with their signature second hand style to create a meaningful and unique space for their clients.

programme.title: Junk Gypsies
programme.desc: Docusoap that follows two sisters, designers and owners of a company called Junk Gypsy Co. based in Round Top, Texas - Amie and Jolie Sikes, who go to various flea markets and hunt for junk that they can turn into high-end decor, which they use to transform homes of their clients. These unique women, whose clientele includes country music stars and Hollywood actors, and have a large and passionate social media fan base, find beauty and value in items that would otherwise end up in the trash.

programme.title: The Great Antiques Challenge
programme.desc: The dealers hunt for a chandelier to finish off a hallway redecoration. Plus, they look for curios to entertain guests at one of the UKs oldest pubs.

programme.title: The Great Antiques Challenge
programme.desc: The dealers look for a train themed armchair to go in a holiday let in Cornwall. Plus, they are tasked with finding curios for a magic themed bar.

programme.title: Epic Mancaves
programme.desc: Brandon, Tomas and the team help to build a mancave in a basement in Michigan that is themed around a nautical theme, equipped with a reclaimed boat that will be turned into a bar.

programme.title: Epic Mancaves
programme.desc: Brandon and Tomas trek to Chicago to build an Army veteran the military bunker of his dreams, featuring a hydraulic-powered mechanized armoury.

programme.title: Building Off the Grid
programme.desc: For many, an ideal existence is as far away from the bustling boulevards and city streets as is physically possible, opting to live in a serene and secluded corner of our planet. This documentary series follows teams of adventuring builders as they construct magnificent and unique properties in far-flung corners of our planet. Battling against adverse conditions, limited budgets and narrow deadlines, these crews strive to get their structures erected in time. From mountain cabins to woodland yurts, shipping container homes to lighthouse conversions, these stunning properties show the true meaning of living off the grid.

programme.title: Flippin RVs
programme.desc: Justin and Anna tackle a 1949 Spartanette. But, it turns into a scavenger hunt for rare, original parts. They throw a party to celebrate the finished RV.

programme.title: Tiny House Hunters
programme.desc: Reality series showing American house hunters who are considering joining the tiny-house revolution where people are choosing to live in smaller homes - often less than 55 square metres -and praising their benefits. In this property series realtors present three petite houses to prospective buyers. Some of the homes would be used as permanent residences whilst others could be a retreat to escape to. There are various reasons for the trend for tiny-living; some people are doing it for financial reasons, others are trying to live more ecologically and some yearn for a simpler lifestyle. When the potential tiny-homeowners are faced with the practical limitations of the properties on offer will they take the plunge and embrace the joys of tiny living? Or will they change their minds for more spacious accommodation?

programme.title: Tiny House Hunters
programme.desc: Reality series showing American house hunters who are considering joining the tiny-house revolution where people are choosing to live in smaller homes - often less than 55 square metres -and praising their benefits. Or will they change their minds for more spacious accommodation?

programme.title: Amazing Water Homes
programme.desc: Captivating docu-reality series in which Rebecca Budig shows viewers some of the worlds most amazing, luxurious and extraordinary water featured homes. You will have a chance to see what happens when you combine creativity, ingenuity and lots and lots of water when she takes us on a tour of cool properties such as a private water parks, islands and lakes, luxury houseboats and yachts with every amenity imaginable including a private crew.

programme.title: In The Eye Of The Storm
programme.desc: In March 2025, a rare train of supercells creates a record 889 tornadoes east of Tornado Alley, along with hailstorms, and kills at least 42 people.

programme.title: Sin City Tow
programme.desc: The people on the Vegas Strip keep the tow bros busy. TW goes toe-to-toe with an angry Elvis, and Jeremy contends with salty strip club clients.

programme.title: Sin City Tow
programme.desc: Pineapple argues with a woman who has a "hall pass" from her husband. Plus, Jeremy gets in a fight, and Elmer hunts for a massive haul.

programme.title: Border Control Sweden
programme.desc: Large quantities of beer are discovered when a car is stopped in Malmo. When the couples stories dont add up Niklas suspects they are planning to sell it.

programme.title: Border Control: Spain
programme.desc: Going through customs can be a stressful experience for most people, even more so if youre attempting to smuggle drugs or weapons into the country. Follow the efforts of the Security and Customs Services at the border of Spain, as they work hard to keep their country safe from criminals. Whether its drugs, weapons or even terrorism, theres a lot of things security have to consider in order to make sure all threats are handled properly. These security forces are always hot on the trail of suspicious activity, in the air, on land or away at sea.

programme.title: Border Control: Spain
programme.desc: Going through customs can be a stressful experience for most people, even more so if youre attempting to smuggle drugs or weapons into the country. Follow the efforts of the Security and Customs Services at the border of Spain, as they work hard to keep their country safe from criminals. Whether its drugs, weapons or even terrorism, theres a lot of things security have to consider in order to make sure all threats are handled properly. These security forces are always hot on the trail of suspicious activity, in the air, on land or away at sea.

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: Gold Rush is a reality television series that follows the placer gold mining efforts of various family-run mining companies in boundless north of America. The series focuses on the work process in the conditions of permafrost and working relations between the participants. The show has 10 seasons altogether. In some episodes participants start the adventure and travel to Alaska to search for gold because of financial issues. They do not have any previous experience and have to learn on the job. Then there appears several gold mining teams that compete with each other. In some episodes the teams move to South America. Admire the courage and determination of the team members in their unstoppable desire to become rich.

programme.title: In The Eye Of The Storm
programme.desc: In March 2025, a rare train of supercells creates a record 889 tornadoes east of Tornado Alley, along with hailstorms, and kills at least 42 people.

programme.title: Inside Outer Space
programme.desc: Come with us as we explore and unravel the mysteries of what lies beyond our planet Earth. This is a series packed with space stories and information about our universe covering what we can see, how we can live in space and what science tells us about the past and the future as we journey inside out of space.

programme.title: Inside Outer Space
programme.desc: Come with us as we explore and unravel the mysteries of what lies beyond our planet Earth. This is a series packed with space stories and information about our universe covering what we can see, how we can live in space and what science tells us about the past and the future as we journey inside out of space.

programme.title: Inside Outer Space
programme.desc: Come with us as we explore and unravel the mysteries of what lies beyond our planet Earth. This is a series packed with space stories and information about our universe covering what we can see, how we can live in space and what science tells us about the past and the future as we journey inside out of space.

programme.title: Zenith - Advances In Space Exploration
programme.desc: Zenith - Advances in Space Exploration reveals these latest developments and the implications they hold for all of us.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: The commercial space flight companies are edging closer and closer to flight readiness. Paying customers will soon be launching into space; tourists and their money is thought to be a major step forward into space and beyond. Blue Origin flight tests have been a great success and may launch commercial flights as soon as years end. Virgin Galactic is also smashing mile stones towards flight certification. SpaceX and its Manned Dragon capsule in direct competition with Boeings moves closer to an ISS taxi service.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: The ESA - JAXA joint Bepi-Colombo Mission is moments away from launch. The target is Mercury which has been too long neglected; this mission will shed new light on this strange world of light and dark.

programme.title: Fragrance and Emotions
programme.desc: Unique documentary that takes you to discover the secret of some of the most luxurious perfumes and emblematic fragrances in the world. Visit the famous city of Grasse to meet the creators, the beautiful flower fields and all the incredible emotional powers of the Perfume.

programme.title: Depleted Uranium, A Very Presentable Killer
programme.desc: More than 50 countries now possess weapons based on depleted uranium (DU). Experimentation has been rife, and the consequences for civilians and the military alike have been dramatic. This investigation compares and contrasts the arguments of those who defend and attack a technology that is highly toxic. For 20 years, scientists, doctors, veterans and activists have denounced the use of DU. Against them are the arms industry lobbyists and nuclear authorities who continue to minimise the risks. Through archive documents, interviews and in situ investigations, accompanied by key witnesses (victims, experts...) we aim to present a clearer picture of the issues and stakes linked to the use of DU. Quick-paced, with a sense of urgency, the film underlines the essential background and conflicting viewpoints, enabling viewers to make up their own minds about a subject that concerns us all.

programme.title: Alien Invaders!
programme.desc: Alien Invaders is a documentary special that throws three young, but experienced, hosts into the world of invasive species of animals, fish, birds, insects, viruses and plants to create television mayhem. The show looks at invasions of aggressive non-indigenous animals around the world. Pacific lionfish are eating their way through the Caribbean, Burmese pythons are infesting the Everglades, African killer bees have worked their way north from Brazil to Utah, Asian carp are now swimming in the millions from New Orleans to Chicago. These and many other "alien invaders" are the villains (and stars!) of our show.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. At the heart of Africa, the Congo for many people will always be associated with Joseph Conrads early twentieth-century novel the Heart of Darkness, a title that has become a by-word for the country. And for Benjamin and David, two former child soldiers, and Funaha held as a sex slave by one of the many militias that continue to terrorise the country, that metaphor remains a daily reality. The film explores how this seemingly never-ending conflict impacts on the people of North Kivu.

programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: Music Voyager is a music and travel broadcast series (television/cable, broadband, in-flight and mobile) that invites viewers to discover the exciting sounds of the planet. The host is Jacob Edgar, an explorer who does not search for lost cities or ancient ruins. Hes on the quest for a different kind of treasure…music. As an ethnomusicologist and world music record producer, Edgar travels the globe hunting for the best songs the world has to offer, and he suffers through some of the worst…so you dont have to. Along the way, hes rewarded with a backstage pass to concert halls, street festivals, recording studios and rehearsal rooms. With local musicians as his guide, Edgar tastes exotic and occasionally ghastly food, visits off-the-beaten path attractions and parties the night away to amazing concerts at hidden venues that only the locals know. Join music voyager for unexpected adventures and surprising discoveries that unveil the magic, mystery and music of far off lands.

programme.title: Past Hunters
programme.desc: Blackpool Pleasure Beach is one of the most visited attractions in the United Kingdom. People visit it not only for the fun, but to also hopefully catch a glimpse of the many ghosts that haunt there.

programme.title: Past Hunters
programme.desc: The former home of Queen Victoria is now home to many spirits who have been seen by guests and staff. Witness the first ever formal documentation of the paranormal activities in the Bulkeley Hotel.

programme.title: Rip Files
programme.desc: The R.I.P. Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Up, up and away! We discover St. Petersburg Floridas aviation roots at the St.Pete History Museum. Then, comb your mustache, we visit the Dali Museum to look at Salvador Dalis amazing masterworks. Well dredge the deep looking for sponges, and defend the bay at Fort Desoto.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: The Great Rift Valley is actually where the continent of Africa is literally tearing itself apart. Its a geologic phenomenon where one side is a rainforest full of colorful birds and strange monkeys and the other, a large lake centered on a vast plain. Two bordering eco-zones…double the wildlife.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: To this day sisal, a rope making fiber plant, is a mainstay of the economy. Journeys tours the capital city of Tanzania and its diverse religious institutions before heading into sisal country. Well learn about the German influences and the seldom heard story of Livingstones final trip across Africa.

programme.title: Everyday Elements
programme.desc: A series that puts chemistry in our everyday experience by showing the living connection we have with the chemicals and elements that make up our world. The matter that built skies and seas, the atoms that make up you and me, the chemistry around us that forms the things we touch, smell and see. This series shows us what the objects in our universe and in our homes are made from and why the particles around us behave as they do. Everything around us is built from Everyday Elements.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Were exploring the other side New York state in Buffalo and Niagara. Well take the oath of office like Teddy, at the Roosevelt inauguration site in Buffalo. Then, well take a tour of the Frank Lloyd Wright Martin house and learn about Americas most celebrated architect. We get soaked on the Maid of the Mist at breathtaking Niagara Falls, and defend the walls at Fort Niagara.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Get your sun tan lotion on, because were headed to the land of perfect weather and sunsets. Well sample a fish taco, climb the 100s of steps of the California Tower, stand on the flight deck of the USS Midway, as well as, revisit San Diegos founding on the San Salvador at the San Diego Maritime museum.

programme.title: Out Of Town Adventures
programme.desc: Outta Town Adventures travels both near and far to discover the best advenures the destinations have to offer. Season 1 visits attractions from California to Rwanda, Switzerland, Iceland, Utah, Zambia, Mexico, The Grand Canyon, Georgia (the Eastern European one) Louisiana, Hawaii, Mauritius and Seychelles. This TV series is dedicated to presenting history, culture and geography in a fun and pisitive way. It encourages people to explore this beautiful world - something that starts with simply getting out of town!

programme.title: Show Me Where You Live
programme.desc: Show me where you live is a documentary series that aims to answer the following question: How can human beings claim ownership to a space so that they can live safely within it, function as a society, and above all be in harmony with the environment around them? As we discover cultures and emblematic populations, we follow Philippe Simay who is at the heart of Inhabiting the World and represents its identity and originality. Philippe takes us on an epic adventure around the Human Habitat and sets the tone for the journey. As a humanist and philosopher, Philippe is a tireless surveyor of the city, and an explorer of living spaces. Determined to travel around the world, Philippe unveils how the populations that he encounters claim the space they occupy, shapes it and adjust to it. In this series of 20 films, of 26 minutes each, the habitat will be a major showcase revealing our capacity to adapt ourselves at a time where we need to find solutions in order to address immense changes.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: They orbit between us and our Star, the inner worlds; hidden within the suns glare often only visible at sunrise or sunset. Venus the first and brightest star in the evening sky, and Mercury fleeting across the solar disk. They are half of our solar systems terrestrial planets yet we know so little. As we begin to take a closer look at our companions they are posing more questions than answers.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: It has fired our imaginations for millennia, Mars, the God of War and the source of Mans science fictional demise. We know the dry barren planet was once flowing with vast reservoirs of water, the sky thick and filled with clouds and the tantalizing possibility of life. It is the only other place in our solar system than Man might one day call home.

programme.title: On the Cities Rooftops
programme.desc: How is life on the citys roofs? This series scales new heights, exploring apartment buildings, towers and monuments to discover a world full of unsuspected treasures : our rooftops. By day and night, the population changes on these heights. There are people who work here, people who live here, and others who come here to relax. The worlds rooftops are a continual hive of activity…

programme.title: On the Cities Rooftops

programme.title: Wow, I Never Knew That!
programme.desc: Before computer drawing programs, there was a toy that if you mastered its two circular white knobs you could have a picture perfect SKETCH. Well explain how the ETCH A SKETCH drew onto the scene. And what did Neil Armstrong REALLY say when he stepped on the moon, the "aahh" answer will surprise you! Plus, where did the explosive name BIKINI come from?

programme.title: Wow, I Never Knew That!
programme.desc: It was the PURRRFECT idea for making our furry friends more pleasant around the house! Youll learn how KITTY LITTER clawed its way into our homes. And youll learn how a garment made out of special woven fibers can stop a bullet, plus, why is walking under a ladder bad luck? And finally, well CUT TO THE CHASE and explain the history behind this common phrase!

programme.title: Of Boats And Men
programme.desc: Travelling by boat bears a priceless sense of Freedom and offers endless new vistas to all passengers. Across waterways around the world Boats are an essential tool of daily life whether they carry goods, serve as utilities or services in remote areas.

programme.title: China Uncovered
programme.desc: Fashion designer Ji Cheng has shown her designs at London fashion week and, like beauty stylist A Zhi, is beginning to challenge the monopoly of Western brands in China. New levels of expendable income mean the wallets of the wealthy elite are helping fund this rising beauty scene and creating a market for luxury goods for shrewd businesswoman Felicity Feng. Expats from everywhere are trying to gain a foothold in this blossoming city, but can they handle its lightning speed?

programme.title: China Uncovered
programme.desc: Famous Chinese Erhu player Zhao Lei is leaving his stamp on classical Chinese music by experimenting with musical fusion between the East and West. On a sharper note in downtown Shanghai, Yuyintang Livehouse opens its doors to contemporary music lovers. The spiritual home of cutting edge beats in Shanghai, Yuyintang has started the careers of Visual Kei band Lilith and progressive metal rockers Mathlotus, but the modern music scene is still reeling from the Rock n Roll ban of the Cultural Revolution. Join them as they strive to become the rock stars of tomorrow.

programme.title: Brazils Coastlines
programme.desc: A series to celebrate Brazil and its diversity. We will explore the beauty and richness of the 8000 kilometer-long coasts, focusing on their natural and geographical aspects but also on its economic and cultural facets. An exciting journey blending the best aerial shots with stunning photography across the country to reveal both a cultural and human portrait.

programme.title: Dream Journey
programme.desc: February 2017 saw me embark upon a travel expedition through Scotland, Poland, France, Mexico, Belize and, (alas!), back. Not only was it the first time I ventured out to Central America, but also the first time I seriously pushed my bravery boundaries to do a whole lot of things Id never tried before. I defeated my life-long fear of scubadiving and skydiving, (the Carribbean vistas do help! - No danger Id do that again in Aberdeen), I went zip-lining over a Mexican jungle, I tried habanero-packed streetfood, (failed at that miserably), and organic tequila, (managed that better;), I climbed a Maya pyramid in the middle of a Belizean rainforest and fed hibiscus flowers to a very extravagant donkey. Most importantly, however, I got to know some incredible people - from shamans, wanderers and artists to refugees, businesswomen and expat cowboys. And thanks to aaaall of that, I also got to know a little bit more about myself for visiting the most remote corners of our planet reminds you how different and yet how similar we all are. Im looking forward to sharing my incredible experience in 5 exciting episodes of our travel series, which really turned out to be a Dream Journey:) I simply cannot wait for more!

programme.title: Race of Life
programme.desc: These are Natures own Battletanks, and (with the exception of the Indian Elephant), all endemic to the African continent. The African Savannah is the stage for thousands of battles every day. How do elephants, these large, cumbersome creatures survive and even prosper on a diet that even the strictest vegetarian would pass on! Well for one thing, most other animals get out of their way. But lions and hyenas are not always so easily moved – they prey on young, sick and old elephants in particular. This seemingly gentle giant has been revealed to have a darker side in the last few years too. They may survive on just plant life, but that doesnt mean they dont like a fight – to the death. Elephants have been observed attacking and killing Rhinos in the last 20 years. Its a savage clash. Meanwhile, the Rhino, a tough looking customer if ever there was one, is an endangered species. When the great herds go on the search for food, predators go on the hunt for them. If ever there was an animal that seems destined to survive, its the Rhino, which has been around for over 6 million years. But it too has an enemy: mankind – the deadliest foe of all. Then theres the hippopotamus. An adult hippo is a huge, aggressive animal, and even the largest crocodiles tend to stay away from it. However, when baby hippos stray from their mothers, then crocodiles, lions and hyenas will have a go if they can get away without being attacked themselves by adults in the baby hippos herd. Thats why baby hippos must stay close to Mum

programme.title: Race of Life
programme.desc: Males and females of most species will fight viciously in self-defense. And females, can be even more aggressive than males when defending their young. In this episode well explore the Race of Life from the point of view of food, territory, social status, and mates. Though some fights occur between two different species, most battles are fought between members of the same species. Though the wildlife warriors in these battles usually are not trying to kill each other, the fighting can result in death. Why would members of the same species fight with such ferocity? Food is one reason. Animals that store and horde food for survival will aggressively protect their pantries. Animals are also willing to fight to protect their food indirectly. For example, predators will defend a territory that provides them with enough prey, or food, to survive. This territorial aggression serves to space out members of a species across their range in a way that maintains sufficient food within each territory. But it also may limit population size. For example, if a pack of wolves cannot find, defend, or take over a suitable territory, the members may starve to death. Though food, territory, social status, and mates may be won and kept by fighting, aggression takes its toll. Animal combatants face exhaustion, injuries, time away from resting and eating, and the ultimate cost of battle: death. Thus, just like human beings, its often in an animals interest to win a war before it ever begins - or to avoid confrontation altogether.

programme.title: Meet My Wild Friend
programme.desc: Gasp at animal power, gawp at childhood innocence, this is the true story of children who live as friends with wild animals. The director of The First Cry, Gilles de Maistre has traveled the world in search of children who maintain unusual and special relationships with wild animals. With the strength of innocence, the power of raw faith and the magic of respect, these little princes have found the balance between two worlds in harmony with one another, where child and animal trust each other, learn to know one another, live together and love each other. Gasp at animal power, gawp at childhood innocence, this is the true story of children who live as friends with wild animals.

programme.title: A Dogs Life
programme.desc: A Dogs Life explores the widely assumed facts that may actually be based on faulty and out-dated research. Ingenious experiments and meticulous observation reveal that the problems dogs solve best are those that involve interacting with humans. A fascinating and fun documentary that gives us a dogs eye view on the world.

programme.title: Animal Doctors
programme.desc: Explore how animals developed over time and generations their own medicine and health care strategies. How have these been passed onto early humans ? Questioning traditional boundaries between human and animal, we will travel from Central African Republic, to Tanzania, from the US to France with the leading experts in animal behaviour. Todays science revisits the birth of animal intelligence and culture.

programme.title: Mongolia, Steppes Emirate
programme.desc: Battered by strong winds, and seen as a grazing land, Mongolia is the kingdom of steppes. With important mineral resources such as copper or uranium, coal and rare soil, Mongolia future is secure: the economy shows a significant growth rate and it is a business paradise for some expatriates. But for most of the population, needs remain unfulfilled.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. At the heart of Africa, the Congo for many people will always be associated with Joseph Conrads early twentieth-century novel the Heart of Darkness, a title that has become a by-word for the country. And for Benjamin and David, two former child soldiers, and Funaha held as a sex slave by one of the many militias that continue to terrorise the country, that metaphor remains a daily reality. The film explores how this seemingly never-ending conflict impacts on the people of North Kivu.

programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: Music Voyager is a music and travel broadcast series (television/cable, broadband, in-flight and mobile) that invites viewers to discover the exciting sounds of the planet. The host is Jacob Edgar, an explorer who does not search for lost cities or ancient ruins. Hes on the quest for a different kind of treasure…music. As an ethnomusicologist and world music record producer, Edgar travels the globe hunting for the best songs the world has to offer, and he suffers through some of the worst…so you dont have to. Along the way, hes rewarded with a backstage pass to concert halls, street festivals, recording studios and rehearsal rooms. With local musicians as his guide, Edgar tastes exotic and occasionally ghastly food, visits off-the-beaten path attractions and parties the night away to amazing concerts at hidden venues that only the locals know. Join music voyager for unexpected adventures and surprising discoveries that unveil the magic, mystery and music of far off lands.

programme.title: Past Hunters
programme.desc: Built in the early 1800s, Whitby Hall used to be an administrative center and now stands as a public park and arts center. It has never before been investigated, but staff have reported many noises and presences among them.

programme.title: Past Hunters
programme.desc: The county of Flintshire in Wales is said to be a land filled with ghosts and haunts. Plas Teg is said to be one of the "most haunted" houses in the area. With over 400 years of history, this place is sure to be the home of many an entity.

Also, well swim with real mermaids at Weeki Wachee Springs in Central Florida, and cheer on Teddy Ballgame at the Ted Williams Hitters Hall of Fame.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: This is one of the few national parks in Africa where the bush meets the ocean. The big game of Africa face off with the creatures of the deep. Our host goes a little rogue for supper and tries his hand at surf netting prawns after spending a day looking for the elusive elephants of Saadani.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Were shipping off to Belfast, Northern Ireland on todays episode. First, well gawk at the worlds biggest Titanic museum. Then, well learn about the provinces complicated history at the Ulster Museum. Finally, we get thrown in the slammer at the very creepy, Crumlin Road Jail.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Bonjour! Were headed to Quebec Province on todays show. First, we get blown away by the thunderous pipes at Montreals Notre Dame Basilica. After that, we go underneath the city at the Pointe a Calliere archaeology museum. Next, well learn about the native ecosystem at the gigantic, indoor, BioDome. Lastly, well learn about the 1967 Montreal Expo at the structures that are still visited today.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: From the beginnings of our Solar System four and half billion years ago there remains tantalizing clues to its evolution; remnent debris: asteroids and comets. They vary in size from grains of dust to mountain sides, footballs to planetoids. They were the building blocks of the planets and perhaps carry the origins of life itself. Now within our grasp these rocks of ice and dust are ready to give up their secrets.

programme.title: Wow, I Never Knew That!
programme.desc: On a hot summers day, nothing cools you down like a frozen fruity popsicle! Youll learn how an 11-year old boy created this sweet icy treat! And, have you ever noticed those colored spinning poles outside the barbershop? Youll be in stitches when you learn how they got their start! Plus, find out how a melting chocolate bar gave way to the invention of the microwave!

programme.title: Wow, I Never Knew That!
programme.desc: Its the city of love, Paris, France. The world over knows its most famous structure, the Eiffel Tower! But did you know PARISIANS originally wanted to tear it down! Well explain why and how it was saved! Then, youll visit Americas FIRST PIZZERIA! And how the gourmet ice cream HAAGEN DAZS got its exotic start in Bronx New York!

programme.title: Water: H2O Stories
programme.desc: Water: H2O Stories is a 3x52 series revisiting the story of water on planet Earth and its disrupted course over time which has led to the 21st century biggest challenge.

programme.title: Blue Realm
programme.desc: Giants of San Benedicto features Dr. Robert Rubin and his ground-breaking research of giant Mantas. Youll travel to the remote Socorro Islands off Mexicos Pacific coast and see breath-taking encounters with enormous manta rays. Youre sure to love these majestic giants as you see how they invite human contact, and encourage certain divers to ride them. The film crew also travels to the Bahamas to visit Bubbles, a fifteen foot Manta in the worlds largest aquarium, and witness her release back into the ocean.

programme.title: Blue Realm
programme.desc: Tentacles follows Dr. Jennifer Mather as she leads a team of renowned scientists to the beautiful Caribbean island of Bonaire. Their mission is to prove a controversial theory: reef squid speak to each other with a complex language they paint on their skin. The episode features the bizarre courtship and never-before-filmed egg-laying rituals of reef squid. Travel to the Pacific Northwest for an encounter with the worlds largest Octopus. Youll also witness the fascinating hunting technique of the cuttlefish.

programme.title: Inside Outer Space
programme.desc: Come with us as we explore and unravel the mysteries of what lies beyond our planet Earth. This is a series packed with space stories and information about our universe covering what we can see, how we can live in space and what science tells us about the past and the future as we journey inside out of space.

programme.title: Inside Outer Space
programme.desc: Come with us as we explore and unravel the mysteries of what lies beyond our planet Earth. This is a series packed with space stories and information about our universe covering what we can see, how we can live in space and what science tells us about the past and the future as we journey inside out of space.

programme.title: Dream Journey
programme.desc: February 2017 saw me embark upon a travel expedition through Scotland, Poland, France, Mexico, Belize and, (alas!), back. Not only was it the first time I ventured out to Central America, but also the first time I seriously pushed my bravery boundaries to do a whole lot of things Id never tried before. I defeated my life-long fear of scubadiving and skydiving, (the Carribbean vistas do help! - No danger Id do that again in Aberdeen), I went zip-lining over a Mexican jungle, I tried habanero-packed streetfood, (failed at that miserably), and organic tequila, (managed that better;), I climbed a Maya pyramid in the middle of a Belizean rainforest and fed hibiscus flowers to a very extravagant donkey. Most importantly, however, I got to know some incredible people - from shamans, wanderers and artists to refugees, businesswomen and expat cowboys. And thanks to aaaall of that, I also got to know a little bit more about myself for visiting the most remote corners of our planet reminds you how different and yet how similar we all are. Im looking forward to sharing my incredible experience in 5 exciting episodes of our travel series, which really turned out to be a Dream Journey:) I simply cannot wait for more!

programme.title: Sarah Shark
programme.desc: Sarah travels to one of the top 10 dive destinations in Australia (Julian Rocks, Byron Bay, NSW) to dive with three species of Wobbegong Sharks within the Cape Byron Marine Park. She also conducts a street poll with members of the public to find out what they think about sharks.

programme.title: Sarah Shark
programme.desc: Sarah travels to one of the top 10 dive destinations in Australia (Julian Rocks, Byron Bay, NSW) to dive with three species of Wobbegong Sharks within the Cape Byron Marine Park. She also conducts a street poll with members of the public to find out what they think about sharks.

programme.title: Wild Australia with Ray Mears
programme.desc: Ray starts by hitching a lift on a research crane to get a birds eye view over the Rainforest; from there, he can see the geographical position responsible for this lush vegetation: mountain range in the west and the sea in the east. He then goes down to the ground, delving into the heart of the jungle, he comes across millennial trees, camouflage spiders and a miniature dinosaur, the Boyds Forest Dragon. He pursues his journey by travelling on a zipwire with wildlife expert, Justin McMahon. Together they observe life in the canopy. Meanwhile, Rays cameraman Martin Hayward Smith has been filming an animal that can only be found in this part of the world: the Bennetts tree kangaroo, a cute marsupial that lives like a monkey.

programme.title: Wild Australia with Ray Mears
programme.desc: Ray takes the Great Ocean Road along the Antarctic facing coast of Australia – the longest South facing coastline in the world. He starts in Port Philp Bay the entrance to Melbourne Harbour where for the first time he sees a strange marine creature – the weedy sea dragon – a relative of the sea horse. He also swims with a unique species of dolphin – the Burrunan Dolphins.Crossing the Bay he heads off down the longest War Memorial in the world – the Great Ocean Road and meets 93 year old Doug Stirling who remembers the world war 1 veterans building the road.Ray visits the Penguin Colony on Middle Island where guard dogs protect the penguins from foxes and he watches the night time return of the penguins after a day spent at sea fishing.He takes to the seas and discovers the creatures of the deep waters – albatross, balls of krill and a pod of fast moving common dolphins.

programme.title: Wild Australia with Ray Mears
programme.desc: In this episode, Ray explores the Red Centre of the country and shows that the Australian desert is filled with life for those who know where to find water.He arrives in the Red Centre by chopper as he flies over the Uluru monolith or Ayres Rock. For his first stop, he goes to a red kangaroo sanctuary where he cuddles a joey, meets their carer Brolga and gets close to the usually wary adult red kangaroos. He pursues his journey deeper in the desert to meet a local aboriginal Sammy Wilson. They go to a traditional waterhole and chat over a camp fire about Sammys ancestral knowledge of the land. Ray spends the night out under the stars before driving more inland to rocky areas where water collects. There Ray comes face to face with a wild kangaroo and rock wallabies. He then follows tracks along a dry river bed that lead him to Australias wild dog: a dingo.

programme.title: Animal Embassy
programme.desc: The dilemma faced by every 21st Century wildlife park is how to attract and educate the public, while maintaining first class conditions for its inhabitants and leading the way in scientific research and environmental protection. Tucked away in the Canary Islands, one zoo is providing a masterclass in the art. For the past 2 years running, Loro Parque has been voted "The Worlds Best Zoo" by subscribers of Trip Advisor, echoing the highest possible accreditations of animal welfare, conservation and environmental bodies across the globe. It is now considered more popular than the prestigious San Diego, Singapore, ZooParc de Beauval, Prague, Chester and St.Louis Zoos. So how has a privately-owned zoo in a Spanish colony off the West coast of Africa earned such recognition? How does it balance the meticulous care and presentation of thousands of species, with the multi-million-dollar research and conservation programs dedicated to saving many of them from extinction? Whats the strategy behind its educational commitment to turning every pleasure-seeking tourist into a die-hard environmentalist? And who manages the harvest of tonnes of organic fruit needed to feed the animals daily? What began 45 years ago with one mans passion for animals and an obsession with excellence has become a monument to best practice ideals. Boasting leading experts in all branches of zoology, animal handling, nutrition and veterinary science, as well as state of the art facilities and cutting-edge technology, Loro Parque talks the talk and walks the walk. Animal Embassy peels back the layers of Loro Parque to expose its pumping heart: the intimate connections, the scale of operations, the dramas, the discoveries, the camaraderie, the hilarity, the uncompromising attention to detail and the unshakable devotion to animal welfare. Entertaining, inspiring and informative, this series is packed with engaging, returnable characters - both animal and human. programme.title: Animal Embassy
programme.desc: Federica the turtle has arrived from Italy after a run in with a container ship. Loro Parques offered to be her forever home, but how will she go sharing her new digs with others? Youve heard of a fish out of water - try a turtle! Esmeralda the iguana has a lumpy belly and Jorge the vet is worried. Hes hoping its a bounty of eggs but knows he shouldnt count his iguanas before they hatch. Its fingers crossed for some scaly babies!

programme.title: Meet My Wild Friend
programme.desc: Gasp at animal power, gawp at childhood innocence, this is the true story of children who live as friends with wild animals. The director of The First Cry, Gilles de Maistre has traveled the world in search of children who maintain unusual and special relationships with wild animals. With the strength of innocence, the power of raw faith and the magic of respect, these little princes have found the balance between two worlds in harmony with one another, where child and animal trust each other, learn to know one another, live together and love each other. Gasp at animal power, gawp at childhood innocence, this is the true story of children who live as friends with wild animals.

programme.title: Life in the Blue
programme.desc: This films reveals the extraordinary variety of life found in the vast blue expanses of te open ocean. Here, all the action takes place in a 10 metre deep band of water, just under the surface. Many species use this section of water to migrate and hunt while others use ingenious ways to stay hidden where there appears to be no shelter. From the surface, the huge blue expanses of the open ocean appear to be devoid of all life. Popular belief is that most sea life congregates around mainline coasts, islands or rocky outcrops. But that perception is far from the truth. This 4K film,shot in the Atlantic, reveals the extraordinary diversity of species who call the open ocean their home and the tactics they use to survive in the watery wilderness. Most of the life here congregates in a nutrient-rich band of water, around 10 metres from the surface. But it is brutal life out in the open ocean. There is little shelter, big predators abound and food is hard to find. Only those who adapt to the conditions have a hope of surviving in the blue void. Barracuda are a common species in the open water and they travel in large spiraling groups close the surface as a defense mechanism against bigger predators. This space is also their own feeding ground and they can attack smaller fish en masse. And where there are barracuda, Blue sharks are never far away. These supreme open ocean predators are among the most graceful of sharks but when the need arises, they can transform instantly into ferocious and efficient killers. They regularly cross the Atlantic, coast to coast, in a journey of 4,000 kilometres. Other species profiled which also undertake huge journeys include turtles, pilot whales and whale sharks, and we reveal how the notorious Portuguese man o war provides shelter for small fish within its lethal tentacles. Other small fish of prey instinctively group together when they are threatened - as lone individuals they are far more likely to be eaten than large groups. But in dramatic close up action, a banquet is served as dolphins sprint in from the blue to harvest this massive source of protein. The film also reveals the amazing variety of life and colour found in shipwrecks. Like oases in the desert,these steel skeletons are colonized by soft and hard corals, attracting huge armies of small fish. They hide in the structures while larger fish and sharks roam the periphery.

programme.title: Stolen Treasures
programme.desc: Its the biggest museum in the world…the museum of artworks stolen over the centuries and never rediscovered. These works haunt the nightmares of their owners, and occupy the days of hundreds of police officers across the world, as well as those of a handful of private agencies; no country or museum of importance can claim to have been spared. According to Interpol, art theft is the fourth largest criminal trade, after the drug trade, the weapons trade and money laundering. How could it be otherwise, when the soaring price of art propels the value of some paintings into the tens of millions of Euros? This world appears to be full of mysteries. Crime syndicates rub shoulders with petty criminals and the police care more about recovering the items than they do about arresting the perpetrators.

programme.title: Mongolia, Steppes Emirate
programme.desc: Battered by strong winds, and seen as a grazing land, Mongolia is the kingdom of steppes. With important mineral resources such as copper or uranium, coal and rare soil, Mongolia future is secure: the economy shows a significant growth rate and it is a business paradise for some expatriates. But for most of the population, needs remain unfulfilled.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. At the heart of Africa, the Congo for many people will always be associated with Joseph Conrads early twentieth-century novel the Heart of Darkness, a title that has become a by-word for the country. And for Benjamin and David, two former child soldiers, and Funaha held as a sex slave by one of the many militias that continue to terrorise the country, that metaphor remains a daily reality. The film explores how this seemingly never-ending conflict impacts on the people of North Kivu.

programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: Music Voyager is a music and travel broadcast series (television/cable, broadband, in-flight and mobile) that invites viewers to discover the exciting sounds of the planet. The host is Jacob Edgar, an explorer who does not search for lost cities or ancient ruins. Hes on the quest for a different kind of treasure…music. As an ethnomusicologist and world music record producer, Edgar travels the globe hunting for the best songs the world has to offer, and he suffers through some of the worst…so you dont have to. Along the way, hes rewarded with a backstage pass to concert halls, street festivals, recording studios and rehearsal rooms. With local musicians as his guide, Edgar tastes exotic and occasionally ghastly food, visits off-the-beaten path attractions and parties the night away to amazing concerts at hidden venues that only the locals know. Join music voyager for unexpected adventures and surprising discoveries that unveil the magic, mystery and music of far off lands.

programme.title: Pazudis
programme.desc: 21 gadu vecā Kortne Stoufere kādā nakrī pazūd no savas gultas. Izmeklētāji pārbauda dažādus pavedienus un versijas, bet jaunā skaistule nekur nav atrodama. Viņas ģimene turpina bezgalīgi cerēt uz labāko.

programme.title: Slepkavība, noslēpumi un mana ģimene
programme.desc: Advokāti atkārtoti izskata izmeklēšanu saistībā ar aprūpes nama iemītnieka saindēšanos Notingemā 1935. gadā, par ko upura medmāsa tika notiesāta un pakārta.

programme.title: Duo Mix
programme.desc: Nakts programma ar mūzikas video dažādām gaumēm. Dejojiet, dziediet līdzi vai izbaudiet, guļot zem segas.

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Pirmās 48 stundas pēc nozieguma izdarīšanas izmeklētāju darbā ir visbūtiskākās, jo tieši šis laikposms nereti izšķir to, vai noziegums tiks atšķetināts. Vēlāk izmeklētāju izredzes notvert vainīgo sarūk uz pusi. Raidījums ļauj ielūkoties ASV slepkavību izmeklētāju ikdienā, kuri neatlaidīgi strādā, lai jau pirmajās nozieguma izdarīšanas stundās atklātu pēc iespējas vairāk detaļu par ļaunprātības apstākļiem. Skatītājus sagaida reāls izmeklēšanas process, liecinieku intervijas, kriminālistiskās ekspertīzes aizkulises un iespēja ielūkoties vietās, kur nupat pastrādāts noziegums.

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: "Zelta zēns", zvaigžņu sportists, Darienas vidusskolas vecākais, apsūdzēts par divu vietējo vidusskolnieču izvarošanu. Viņš neierodas tiesā un izvairās no FIB un Interpola, cenšoties izbēgt no tiesas.

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: 1980. gada pavasarī un vasarā Losandželosā stiro sērijveida slepkavas, kas nolaupa sievietes un atstāj viņu ķermeņus neparastās vietās.

programme.title: Slepkavība brīvdienās
programme.desc: Reaģējot uz laupīšanu sporta preču veikalā Ziemassvētku vakarā, Teksasas štata Ērvingas pilsētas policists tiek aukstasinīgi nošauts. Tiek atklāta slepkavu identitāte, un lieta pārvēršas valsts mēroga medībās.

programme.title: Slepkavība brīvdienās
programme.desc: Koledžas studente atrasta mirusi ceļa malā pēc Jaungada ballītes viņas dzimtajā pilsētā Fillmorā, Kalifornijā. Izmeklētāji kā vienu no iespējām izskata, ka slepkava varētu būt viens no daudzajiem ballīšu apmeklētājiem, kas sagaidīja Jauno gadu.

programme.title: Pazudis
programme.desc: Sieva, māte un bībeles skolotāja Lina Mesere pazudusi no ģimenes fermas netālu no Seintdženevīvas Misuri. Viņas divi dēli, divas māsas, vietējais šerifs un pat visa komūna izmisīgi meklē viņu vairāk nekā divus gadus. Bet tad..

programme.title: Slepkavība, noslēpumi un mana ģimene
programme.desc: Advokāti Džeremijs Deins un Saša Vasa atskatās uz savu izmeklēšanu par vīrieša slepeno saindēšanu, ko viņa sieva 1930. gados Linkolnšīrā veica, un ko atklāja anonīma piezīme.

programme.title: Slepkavība, noslēpumi un mana ģimene
programme.desc: Advokāti Džeremijs Deins un Saša Vasa atskatās uz lietu, kas ir dīvaināka nekā izdomājums: Džons Dikmens tika pakārts Ņūkāslas cietumā par Džona Nisbeta slepkavību vilcienā.

programme.title: Slepkavas motīvs
programme.desc: Kad Kalifornijā pazūd četru cilvēku, tostarp divu mazu bērnu, ģimene, policija uzskata, ka viņi aizbēguši. Paiet desmitgade līdz atklājas - viņus nogalinājis slepkava, kas nozieguma brīdī nemaz nebija slēpies.

programme.title: Slepkavas motīvs
programme.desc: Armijnieks tiek nošauts kādā Kalifornijas tuksneša mazpilsētā. Izmeklēšana pārbauda draudzības saiknes un ģimenes lojalitāti, cenšoties atrast slepkavu.

programme.title: Slepkavas motīvs
programme.desc: Radio personība un veterānu aizstāve tiek nošauta pašas guļamistabā. Vai viņas skaļā viedokļa paušana bija iemesls šim noziegumam vai tomēr viņas ģimene slēpj pēdas līdz slepkavai?

programme.title: Ņujorkas slepkavība
programme.desc: Pēc mīļota Kvīnsas geja brutālās slepkavības kopiena sapulcējas, kamēr Ņujorkas policijas izmeklētāji slepenā misijā medī slepkavas.

programme.title: Ņujorkas slepkavība
programme.desc: Austrumhārlemā ikviens pazina Džeisonu Adamsu. Kad viņš tiek atrasts nodurts, pārbiedētajai sabiedrībai rodas tikai viens jautājums - kurš gan varēja vēlēties viņa nāvi? Izmeklētāji ir satriekti, un tikai negaidīta avota padoms palīdz sākt šķetināt šo slepkavību.

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Pirmās 48 stundas pēc nozieguma izdarīšanas izmeklētāju darbā ir visbūtiskākās, jo tieši šis laikposms nereti izšķir to, vai noziegums tiks atšķetināts. Vēlāk izmeklētāju izredzes notvert vainīgo sarūk uz pusi. Raidījums ļauj ielūkoties ASV slepkavību izmeklētāju ikdienā, kuri neatlaidīgi strādā, lai jau pirmajās nozieguma izdarīšanas stundās atklātu pēc iespējas vairāk detaļu par ļaunprātības apstākļiem. Skatītājus sagaida reāls izmeklēšanas process, liecinieku intervijas, kriminālistiskās ekspertīzes aizkulises un iespēja ielūkoties vietās, kur nupat pastrādāts noziegums.

Skatītājus sagaida reāls izmeklēšanas process, liecinieku intervijas, kriminālistiskās ekspertīzes aizkulises un iespēja ielūkoties vietās, kur nupat pastrādāts noziegums.

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Pirmās 48 stundas pēc nozieguma izdarīšanas izmeklētāju darbā ir visbūtiskākās, jo tieši šis laikposms nereti izšķir to, vai noziegums tiks atšķetināts. Vēlāk izmeklētāju izredzes notvert vainīgo sarūk uz pusi. Raidījums ļauj ielūkoties ASV slepkavību izmeklētāju ikdienā, kuri neatlaidīgi strādā, lai jau pirmajās nozieguma izdarīšanas stundās atklātu pēc iespējas vairāk detaļu par ļaunprātības apstākļiem. Skatītājus sagaida reāls izmeklēšanas process, liecinieku intervijas, kriminālistiskās ekspertīzes aizkulises un iespēja ielūkoties vietās, kur nupat pastrādāts noziegums.

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: Luiziānas naktsklubā tiek atrasts nežēlīgi nogalināts vīrietis. Ar roku rakstītā zīmīte, kas piesūcināta ar upura asinīm, vēsta: "Tu man pielaidi AIDS." Policijai ir vairāk jautājumu nekā atbilžu. Vai tas bija naida noziegums? Vai slepkava uzbruks atkal?

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: "Stocking Strangler" sērijveida slepkavas medības Kolumbusā beigu beigās noved pie Karltona Gerija aresta un notiesāšanas. Šaubas par viņa vainu rodas vairākus gadus vēlāk.

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: No elitārās koledžas pilsētas pazūd divas sievietes. Sabiedrību pārņem panika -- ir atrasti viņu ķermeņi. Kādus ļaunus noslēpumus policija atklās, divām ģimenēm mudinot sabiedrību palīdzēt slepkavas meklēšanā un notiesāšanā?

programme.title: Pazudis
programme.desc: Pēc skolas 2015. gada 1. septembrī mājās nepārrodas jaunais Masīns Smits. Viņa vecāki raizējas un ir nobažījušies par sava jaunākā bērna drošību un viņu piemeklējušo likteni.

programme.title: Pazudis
programme.desc: 21 gadu vecā Kortne Stoufere kādā nakrī pazūd no savas gultas. Izmeklētāji pārbauda dažādus pavedienus un versijas, bet jaunā skaistule nekur nav atrodama. Viņas ģimene turpina bezgalīgi cerēt uz labāko.

programme.title: Slepkavība, noslēpumi un mana ģimene
programme.desc: Advokāti Saša un Džeremijs atskatās uz lietu par māti, kas apsūdzēta par savas ģimenes slepkavību saindēšanas panikas kulminācijā Viktorijas laikmeta Lielbritānijā.

programme.title: Slepkavība, noslēpumi un mana ģimene
programme.desc: Advokāti atkārtoti izskata savu izmeklēšanu par bēdīgi slaveno Viktorijas laikmeta slepkavības lietu, kurā jaunai amerikānietei tika izvirzītas apsūdzības par sava vīra saindēšanu Liverpūlē 1889. gadā.

programme.title: Slepkavība, noslēpumi un mana ģimene
programme.desc: Advokāti atkārtoti izskata izmeklēšanu saistībā ar aprūpes nama iemītnieka saindēšanos Notingemā 1935. gadā, par ko upura medmāsa tika notiesāta un pakārta.

programme.title: Slepkavas motīvs
programme.desc: Populāra terapeite vienā dienā ir pilnīgi vesela, bet jau nākamajā nomirst sāpīgā nāvē. Kad ārsti atklāj viņas nāves iemeslu, kas nav dabīgs, policijai jāsāk meklēt, kurš un kāpēc vēlējās šīs sievietes nāvi.

programme.title: Slepkavas motīvs
programme.desc: Kad Luiziānā tiek atrasts apdrošināšanas brokera Braiena Deivisa līķis, policija atklāj, ka viņš bija cilvēks ar noslēpumainu dzīvi. Vai viņa tuvākie varētu slēpt līdz šim lielāko mirušā noslēpumu?

programme.title: Ņujorkas slepkavība
programme.desc: Talantīgā māksliniece Dženifera Stāla un četri viņas draugi tiek atrasti nošauti virs Ņujorkas ikoniskās Kārnegijas Deli teātru rajonā. Kad parādās šīs ziņas, visa pilsēta baidās, ka brīvībā atrodas aukstasinīgs slepkava.

programme.title: Ņujorkas slepkavība
programme.desc: Masu apšaudē Čelsijā ir viens bojāgājušais un trīs ievainotie. Izmeklētāji atklāj, ka šī ir jaunākā slepkavību sērija, kas aptver vairākus iecirkņus. Izmeklētāji nonāk Ņujorkas pazemes pasaulē.

programme.title: Ņujorkas slepkavība
programme.desc: Ņujorkas policijas izmeklētāji sacenšas, lai atklātu dīvaino savējā slepkavību, pirms viltīgais slepkava izslīd no valsts.

programme.title: Duo Mix
programme.desc: Nakts programma ar mūzikas video dažādām gaumēm. Dejojiet, dziediet līdzi vai izbaudiet, guļot zem segas.

programme.title: Kailā pievilcība
programme.desc: Savdabīgs randiņu šovs, kurā cilvēki līdz ar mīlas peripetijām iepazīstas ar pakāpeniski atkalinātiem ķermeņiem. Pēcāk jāizģērbjas arī viņiem pašiem un jāizvēlas.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Divi brāļi nevarētu būt dažādāk –: Čārlijam ir viss, ko dzīvē var vēlēties: nauda, skaista māja okeāna piekrastē, pavisam nedaudz darāmā un neskaitāmas draudzenes. Turpretī Alans ir īsts neveiksminieks – no viņa ir izšķīrusies sieva, kura ir paturējusi sev abu kopīgi iegādāto māju, un Alans nespēj savilkt kopā galus, lai samaksātu rēķinus. Tā kā Alanam nav pa kabatai atļauties savu mājokli, viņš lūdz Čārlijam atļauju padzīvot pie viņa kādu laiciņu, kamēr apradīs ar jauno situāciju un atradīs pats savu mājvietu. Viņi pat nenojauta, uz cik ilgu laiku tas ievilksies un cik daudz jautrības tas sagādās skatītājiem.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Divi brāļi nevarētu būt dažādāk –: Čārlijam ir viss, ko dzīvē var vēlēties: nauda, skaista māja okeāna piekrastē, pavisam nedaudz darāmā un neskaitāmas draudzenes. Viņi pat nenojauta, uz cik ilgu laiku tas ievilksies un cik daudz jautrības tas sagādās skatītājiem.

programme.title: Mani sauc Erls
programme.desc: Erls un Rendijs dodas uz Meksiku, lai atvestu atpakaļ Katalīnu un dotu Rendijam iespēju atklāt viņa jūtas, bet Erla bailes no lidošana rada neparedzētas problēmas.

programme.title: Mani sauc Erls
programme.desc: Erls netīšām piekrīt precēties ar Katalīnu, lai viņa varētu atgriezties ASV, kas salauž Rendijam sirdi.

programme.title: Pidurdunud areng
programme.desc: Maikls Blūts nosoda savu ģimeni - Džordžs vecākais kopā ar savu sekretāri Kitiju aizbēg uz Meksiku. Kad Maikls paziņo par plāniem pārcelties uz Fīniksu, Barijs viņu informē, ka viņš nevar pamest Kaliforniju, pretējā gadījumā viņam tiks izvirzīta apsūdzība par tēva noziegumiem.

programme.title: Pidurdunud areng
programme.desc: Maikla jaunais biznesa modelis izgāžas pretēji cerībām. Gobs iesaka divu nedēļu laikā uzbūvēt viltus māju. Džordžs vecākais ierodas Meksikā, kur viņu notver cietuma sargi, kurus ievainojusi nekvalitatīva ierīce, ko viņš pirms vairākiem gadiem mēģināja tirgot Meksikā.

programme.title: Pidurdunud areng
programme.desc: Maikls uzzina, ka lielākā daļa viņa ģimenes ir uzņēmuma algoto darbinieku sarakstā, lai gan tur nestrādā. Gobs un Basters tiek nosūtīti strādāt būvlaukumā, kamēr Lindsija atbild uz uzņēmuma telefona zvaniem.

programme.title: Pidurdunud areng
programme.desc: Maiklam ir vienas nakts sakars ar kādu Megiju Laizeri. Viņu pārņem vainas apziņa, uzzinot, ka viņa ir teju akla, bet domas mainās, jo atklājas, ka viņa ir prokurore pret viņa ģimeni. Tikmēr Gobs apprecas ar sievieti un mēģina panākt šķiršanos.

programme.title: Pidurdunud areng
programme.desc: Cīnoties ar dilemmu par to, vai atvērt sava tēva lietas materiālus, Maikls atklāj patiesību par Megiju.

programme.title: Pidurdunud areng
programme.desc: Maikls nepakļaujas savam tēvam un atlaiž nekompetento Kitiju. Viņa varētu atklāt noslēpumus, kas vēl vairāk sabojātu ģimenes reputāciju.

programme.title: Pidurdunud areng
programme.desc: Lai iebiedētu uzņēmuma grāmatvedi, kas gatavojas liecināt pret Džordžu vecāko, Gobs rīko vecpuišu ballīti, kurā viņš mēģina grāmatvedi pārliecināt, ka viņš nogalinājis striptīzdejotāju.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Bada brālēns izšķīries, uzzinot, ko viņa sieva izdarīja ar Badu tieši pirms kāzām. Pareizāk sakot, viņš precīzi nezina, ka tas bija Bads, bet apņēmies to noskaidrot. Kamēr Bads gaida, kas notiks, viņš no visiem cilvēkiem vēršas pie Ala, lai pārrunātu savas rīcības morāli.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Alam izdodas iegūt divas labas biļetes uz labdarības zvaigžņu basketbola spēli, bet Pegija sabojā viņa jautrību, uzstājot, ka viņa nāks līdzi. Viss kļūst vēl ļaunāk, kad viņi samainās vietām, un tieši viņa iepriekšējā sēdvieta tiek izvēlēta soda metiena konkursam ar 10 tūkstošu dolāru balvu.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Alam izdodas iegūt divas labas biļetes uz labdarības zvaigžņu basketbola spēli, bet Pegija sabojā viņa jautrību, uzstājot, ka viņa nāks līdzi. Viss kļūst vēl ļaunāk, kad viņi samainās vietām, un tieši viņa iepriekšējā sēdvieta tiek izvēlēta soda metiena konkursam ar 10 tūkstošu dolāru balvu.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Als ir sajūsmā - viņa bērnības draudzene lūdz palīdzību, lai tiktu galā ar jaunu bandītu un viņa bandu, kas uzmācas pilsētas centra veikalā, kur viņa tagad strādā. Bet kā Als to izskaidros Pegijai?

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Pārējie Bandiji domā, ka Bads ir jokains - viņi nejauši noklausās viņa pagrabstāva sarunu ar savu "foršo" alter-ego, kurš ierodas no cita visuma un parāda Badam sieviešu savaldzināšanas taktiku.

programme.title: Mani sauc Erls
programme.desc: Erls un Rendijs lūdz Katalīnai atgriezties viņas vecajā darbā striptīza klubā, bet viņi neatklāj, ka tas ir vajadzīgs, lai dabūtu Džojas drošības naudu.

programme.title: Mani sauc Erls
programme.desc: Erls izpērk savu vainu, jo ņirgājās par meiteni ar ūsām, un tas viņam liek stāties pretī savām bailēm novilkt kreklu cilvēku priekšā.

programme.title: Mani sauc Erls
programme.desc: Rendijam iepatīkas sieviete no Erla sarakta, tāpēc viņš izliekas par kaķu mīli. Bet ņemot vērā Rendija pagātni, Erls zina, ka tas nebeigsies labi.

programme.title: Mani sauc Erls
programme.desc: Erlam jāsasauc kopā savu veco grupu, lai izsvītrotu no saraksta vecu vīru. Bet tas atklāj nejauku noslēpumu, liekot Erlam apprecēt Ralfa mammu.

programme.title: Mani sauc Erls
programme.desc: Erls grib atvainoties dusmīgajai treileru parka menedžerei par viņas izjokošanu. Bet viņa joks lika viņai kļūt jaukākai un atvainošanās padarīja viņu vēl dusmīgāku nekā agrāk.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Kā tas ir, kad ģimene ceļ un grauj vienlaicīgi? Par to komēdijseriāla septītajā sezonā turpinās pārliecināties Reimonds, saukts arī par Reju, kuram ir ne tikai sieva, trīs bērni un sava sporta sleja avīzē, bet arī kolorīti vecāki, kuri dzīvo tur pat pāri ielai, un brālis. Tā kā Rejs ir mātes luteklītis, tas ietekmē attiecības gan ar brāli, gan sievu un pārējiem ģimenes locekļiem. Seriāls balstīts uz patiesiem notikumiem - visiem tiem, kuri var notikt ar ikvienu no mums, tāpēc bez smiekliem neiztikt.

programme.desc: Divi brāļi nevarētu būt dažādāk –: Čārlijam ir viss, ko dzīvē var vēlēties: nauda, skaista māja okeāna piekrastē, pavisam nedaudz darāmā un neskaitāmas draudzenes. Turpretī Alans ir īsts neveiksminieks – no viņa ir izšķīrusies sieva, kura ir paturējusi sev abu kopīgi iegādāto māju, un Alans nespēj savilkt kopā galus, lai samaksātu rēķinus. Tā kā Alanam nav pa kabatai atļauties savu mājokli, viņš lūdz Čārlijam atļauju padzīvot pie viņa kādu laiciņu, kamēr apradīs ar jauno situāciju un atradīs pats savu mājvietu. Viņi pat nenojauta, uz cik ilgu laiku tas ievilksies un cik daudz jautrības tas sagādās skatītājiem.

programme.title: Pidurdunud areng
programme.desc: Maikls uzzina, ka lielākā daļa viņa ģimenes ir uzņēmuma algoto darbinieku sarakstā, lai gan tur nestrādā. Gobs un Basters tiek nosūtīti strādāt būvlaukumā, kamēr Lindsija atbild uz uzņēmuma telefona zvaniem.

programme.title: Pidurdunud areng
programme.desc: Maiklam ir vienas nakts sakars ar kādu Megiju Laizeri. Viņu pārņem vainas apziņa, uzzinot, ka viņa ir teju akla, bet domas mainās, jo atklājas, ka viņa ir prokurore pret viņa ģimeni. Tikmēr Gobs apprecas ar sievieti un mēģina panākt šķiršanos.

programme.title: Pidurdunud areng
programme.desc: Cīnoties ar dilemmu par to, vai atvērt sava tēva lietas materiālus, Maikls atklāj patiesību par Megiju.

programme.title: Pidurdunud areng
programme.desc: Maikls nepakļaujas savam tēvam un atlaiž nekompetento Kitiju. Viņa varētu atklāt noslēpumus, kas vēl vairāk sabojātu ģimenes reputāciju.

programme.title: Pidurdunud areng
programme.desc: Lai iebiedētu uzņēmuma grāmatvedi, kas gatavojas liecināt pret Džordžu vecāko, Gobs rīko vecpuišu ballīti, kurā viņš mēģina grāmatvedi pārliecināt, ka viņš nogalinājis striptīzdejotāju.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Ofisā, kura darbinieki nodarbojas ar papīra pārdošanu un piegādi, viss ir tāpat kā lielākajā daļā pasaules ofisu - tajā ir boss, tajā ir dažādi darbinieki, no kuriem dažs labs vien darbu tikai imitē, un starp visiem izveidojušās ofisa attiecības tādā kā piespiedu kārtā - labākas un arī ne tik labas. Kā jau ar kolēģiem. Ofisa vadītājs Maikls, kuru attēlo slavenais aktieris un komiķis Stīvs Karels, savus darbiniekus ik dienas cenšas iesaistīt savos izgudrotajos jokos un uzdevumos. Viņš pats domā, ka ir pasaules labākais boss, ko apliecina krūzīte ar uzrakstu - "Pasaules labākais boss". Diemžēl šo krūzīti viņš sev nopircis pats. Maikls cenšas būt draudzīgs pret saviem darbiniekiem, tomēr lielākā daļa viņa joku ir rasistiski, šovinistiski vai citādi aizskaroši.

programme.title: Draugi
programme.desc: Seriāla galvenie varoņi ir seši draugi - Reičela, Monika, Fēbe, Džoijs, Čendlers un Ross, kuri dzīvo kaimiņos un regulāri nonāk aizraujošās un ļoti komiskās situācijās.

programme.title: Kailā pievilcība
programme.desc: Savdabīgs randiņu šovs, kurā cilvēki līdz ar mīlas peripetijām iepazīstas ar pakāpeniski atkalinātiem ķermeņiem. Pēcāk jāizģērbjas arī viņiem pašiem un jāizvēlas.

programme.title: Kailā pievilcība
programme.desc: Savdabīgs randiņu šovs, kurā cilvēki līdz ar mīlas peripetijām iepazīstas ar pakāpeniski atkalinātiem ķermeņiem. Pēcāk jāizģērbjas arī viņiem pašiem un jāizvēlas.

programme.title: Kailā pievilcība
programme.desc: Savdabīgs randiņu šovs, kurā cilvēki līdz ar mīlas peripetijām iepazīstas ar pakāpeniski atkalinātiem ķermeņiem. Pēcāk jāizģērbjas arī viņiem pašiem un jāizvēlas.

programme.title: Pidurdunud areng
programme.desc: Kamēr Maikla ģimene vēršas pret uzņēmuma līdzekļiem, kas nesen atsaldēti, Maikls no sava onkuļa Oskara iegādājas bezvērtīgu zemi.

programme.title: Pidurdunud areng
programme.desc: Maikls Blūts nosoda savu ģimeni - Džordžs vecākais kopā ar savu sekretāri Kitiju aizbēg uz Meksiku. Kad Maikls paziņo par plāniem pārcelties uz Fīniksu, Barijs viņu informē, ka viņš nevar pamest Kaliforniju, pretējā gadījumā viņam tiks izvirzīta apsūdzība par tēva noziegumiem.

programme.title: Pidurdunud areng
programme.desc: Maikls atklāj noslēpumu, kas slēpjas aiz tēva finansiālajām problēmām. Džordžs vecākais cietumā piedzīvo sirdslēkmi, un viņam izdodas izbēgt no slimnīcas.

programme.title: Pidurdunud areng
programme.desc: Maikls Blūts nosoda savu ģimeni - Džordžs vecākais kopā ar savu sekretāri Kitiju aizbēg uz Meksiku. Kad Maikls paziņo par plāniem pārcelties uz Fīniksu, Barijs viņu informē, ka viņš nevar pamest Kaliforniju, pretējā gadījumā viņam tiks izvirzīta apsūdzība par tēva noziegumiem.

programme.title: Pidurdunud areng
programme.desc: Maikla jaunais biznesa modelis izgāžas pretēji cerībām. Gobs iesaka divu nedēļu laikā uzbūvēt viltus māju. Džordžs vecākais ierodas Meksikā, kur viņu notver cietuma sargi, kurus ievainojusi nekvalitatīva ierīce, ko viņš pirms vairākiem gadiem mēģināja tirgot Meksikā.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Mārsija mēģina pārvarēt bailes no publiskas uzstāšanās, fantazējot, ka viņa atrodas citur (nodarbojas ar seksu guļamistabā), kas ir īsts kārums skatītājiem. Vienīgie cilvēki, kurus atslābina Mārsija imitētās mīlēšanās prasmes, ir apmulsušais Džefersons, šokētā Pegija un riebīgais Als, kurš ir aizrāvies ar repa video.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Mārsija mēģina pārvarēt bailes no publiskas uzstāšanās, fantazējot, ka viņa atrodas citur (nodarbojas ar seksu guļamistabā), kas ir īsts kārums skatītājiem. Vienīgie cilvēki, kurus atslābina Mārsija imitētās mīlēšanās prasmes, ir apmulsušais Džefersons, šokētā Pegija un riebīgais Als, kurš ir aizrāvies ar repa video.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Pārliecināti, ka iespējams dalīties, Kellija un Bads liek kopā savu naudu, vēloties nopirkt automašīnu, ko abi vēlas. Neviens no viņiem nav ar mieru padoties kādu laiku pavadīt vienatnē, kamēr otrs devies uz randiņiem.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Helovīna vakarā Grims Rīpers (tumšmatainas Pegijas izskatā) beidzot atbild uz Ala ilgi loloto aicinājumu pēc nāves viņu nepamest, kamēr kāds no viņa ģimenes locekļiem nepateiks, ka viņš viņiem ir vajadzīgs.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Als nolīgst nesen skolu absolvējušo Āronu strādāt savā apavu veikalā vasarā. Ārons Alu uzskata par varoni, un, paziņojot par savu lēmumu precēties, Als izmanto visas priekšrocības, dodot zēnam gudrības, lai viņš nekad neprecētos un kļūtu līdzīgs viņam un miljoniem citu ilgi cietušu precētu vīriešu - zaudētāju.

programme.title: Mani sauc Erls
programme.desc: Erls apsola palīdzēt vīrietim no treileru parka atgūt viņa sapņu meiteni, bet viņš pats iemīlas. Džoja sadusmojas uz Darnelu, kad uzzina, ka viņš ir Liecinieku aizsardzības programmā.

programme.title: Mani sauc Erls
programme.desc: Erls atved narkomānam gaisa kondicionieri, ko bija no viņa nozadzis, un nedēļu nodzīvo komūnā. Šī pieredze liek viņam sākt domāt par vidi, kas rada lielu stresu.

programme.title: Mani sauc Erls
programme.desc: Erls mēģina padarīt Keniju vīrišķīgāku, bet tā vietā padara viņus abus atkarīgus no azartspēlēm. Viņa atkarība izraisa Katalīnas deportāciju, pirms Rendijs paspēj viņai atzīties jūtās.

programme.title: Mani sauc Erls
programme.desc: Erls un Rendijs dodas uz Meksiku, lai atvestu atpakaļ Katalīnu un dotu Rendijam iespēju atklāt viņa jūtas, bet Erla bailes no lidošana rada neparedzētas problēmas.

programme.title: Mani sauc Erls
programme.desc: Erls netīšām piekrīt precēties ar Katalīnu, lai viņa varētu atgriezties ASV, kas salauž Rendijam sirdi.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Kā tas ir, kad ģimene ceļ un grauj vienlaicīgi? Par to komēdijseriāla septītajā sezonā turpinās pārliecināties Reimonds, saukts arī par Reju, kuram ir ne tikai sieva, trīs bērni un sava sporta sleja avīzē, bet arī kolorīti vecāki, kuri dzīvo tur pat pāri ielai, un brālis. Tā kā Rejs ir mātes luteklītis, tas ietekmē attiecības gan ar brāli, gan sievu un pārējiem ģimenes locekļiem. Seriāls balstīts uz patiesiem notikumiem - visiem tiem, kuri var notikt ar ikvienu no mums, tāpēc bez smiekliem neiztikt.

programme.desc: Divi brāļi nevarētu būt dažādāk –: Čārlijam ir viss, ko dzīvē var vēlēties: nauda, skaista māja okeāna piekrastē, pavisam nedaudz darāmā un neskaitāmas draudzenes. Turpretī Alans ir īsts neveiksminieks – no viņa ir izšķīrusies sieva, kura ir paturējusi sev abu kopīgi iegādāto māju, un Alans nespēj savilkt kopā galus, lai samaksātu rēķinus. Tā kā Alanam nav pa kabatai atļauties savu mājokli, viņš lūdz Čārlijam atļauju padzīvot pie viņa kādu laiciņu, kamēr apradīs ar jauno situāciju un atradīs pats savu mājvietu. Viņi pat nenojauta, uz cik ilgu laiku tas ievilksies un cik daudz jautrības tas sagādās skatītājiem.

programme.title: Pidurdunud areng
programme.desc: Kamēr Maikla ģimene vēršas pret uzņēmuma līdzekļiem, kas nesen atsaldēti, Maikls no sava onkuļa Oskara iegādājas bezvērtīgu zemi.

programme.title: Pidurdunud areng
programme.desc: Policija mēģina Maiklu vainot Kitijas pazušanā. Savukārt Maikls ņem līdzi Meibiju uz pasākumu "Aizved meitu uz darbu".

programme.title: Pidurdunud areng
programme.desc: Maikls atklāj noslēpumu, kas slēpjas aiz tēva finansiālajām problēmām. Džordžs vecākais cietumā piedzīvo sirdslēkmi, un viņam izdodas izbēgt no slimnīcas.

programme.title: Pidurdunud areng
programme.desc: Maikls Blūts nosoda savu ģimeni - Džordžs vecākais kopā ar savu sekretāri Kitiju aizbēg uz Meksiku. Kad Maikls paziņo par plāniem pārcelties uz Fīniksu, Barijs viņu informē, ka viņš nevar pamest Kaliforniju, pretējā gadījumā viņam tiks izvirzīta apsūdzība par tēva noziegumiem.

programme.title: Pidurdunud areng
programme.desc: Maikla jaunais biznesa modelis izgāžas pretēji cerībām. Gobs iesaka divu nedēļu laikā uzbūvēt viltus māju. Džordžs vecākais ierodas Meksikā, kur viņu notver cietuma sargi, kurus ievainojusi nekvalitatīva ierīce, ko viņš pirms vairākiem gadiem mēģināja tirgot Meksikā.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Ofisā, kura darbinieki nodarbojas ar papīra pārdošanu un piegādi, viss ir tāpat kā lielākajā daļā pasaules ofisu - tajā ir boss, tajā ir dažādi darbinieki, no kuriem dažs labs vien darbu tikai imitē, un starp visiem izveidojušās ofisa attiecības tādā kā piespiedu kārtā - labākas un arī ne tik labas. Kā jau ar kolēģiem. Ofisa vadītājs Maikls, kuru attēlo slavenais aktieris un komiķis Stīvs Karels, savus darbiniekus ik dienas cenšas iesaistīt savos izgudrotajos jokos un uzdevumos. Viņš pats domā, ka ir pasaules labākais boss, ko apliecina krūzīte ar uzrakstu - "Pasaules labākais boss". Diemžēl šo krūzīti viņš sev nopircis pats. Maikls cenšas būt draudzīgs pret saviem darbiniekiem, tomēr lielākā daļa viņa joku ir rasistiski, šovinistiski vai citādi aizskaroši.

programme.desc: Seriāla galvenie varoņi ir seši draugi - Reičela, Monika, Fēbe, Džoijs, Čendlers un Ross, kuri dzīvo kaimiņos un regulāri nonāk aizraujošās un ļoti komiskās situācijās.

programme.title: Kailā pievilcība
programme.desc: Savdabīgs randiņu šovs, kurā cilvēki līdz ar mīlas peripetijām iepazīstas ar pakāpeniski atkalinātiem ķermeņiem. Pēcāk jāizģērbjas arī viņiem pašiem un jāizvēlas.

programme.title: Kailā pievilcība
programme.desc: Savdabīgs randiņu šovs, kurā cilvēki līdz ar mīlas peripetijām iepazīstas ar pakāpeniski atkalinātiem ķermeņiem. Pēcāk jāizģērbjas arī viņiem pašiem un jāizvēlas.

programme.title: Mārlova slepkavību klubs
programme.desc: Kad bagāts baronets viens pats nomirst savā istabā dienu pirms kāzām, Džūdita, Beka un Sjūzija jau atkal nonāk aizraujoša noslēpuma epicentrā.

programme.title: Sisi
programme.desc: Seriāls "Sisi" ir patiesos notikumos balstīts intrigu pilns stāsts par slavenās pēdējās Austroungārijas imperatores Elizabetes jeb Sisi vētrainajiem dzīves līkločiem. Ar ķeizarienes statusu, leģendāro skaistumu, beznosacījuma brīvības mīlestību un solījumu piešķirt Habsburgu monarhijai žēlsirdīgāku imidžu Sisi vairāk nekā pusgadsimtu ir apbūrusi visu Eiropu un miljoniem cilvēku. Jaunais seriāls, kas uzņemts Austrijā, Latvijā, Lietuvā un Ungārijā, galveno uzmanību pievērš Elizabetes jaunības gadiem, viņas mīlas stāstam ar imperatoru Franci Jozefu, mēģinājumiem iekļauties Austrijas galmā un pastāvīgo konfrontāciju ar erchercogieni Sofiju. Sisi bija ne tikai sieva un māte, bet arī iekaroja savu vietu valsts politiskajā dzīvē, dodot lielu ieguldījumu diplomātijas kompromisu mākslā un Austroungārijas monarhijas dzimšanā.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Seriāla darbība notiek 19. gs. 90. gados. Viljams Mērdoks, kurš aizrautīgi seko līdzi jaunākajiem zinātnes sasniegumiem un bieži izmanto šīs zināšanas arī savā darbā, risina dažādus noziegumus.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Seriāla darbība notiek 19. gs. 90. gados. Viljams Mērdoks, kurš aizrautīgi seko līdzi jaunākajiem zinātnes sasniegumiem un bieži izmanto šīs zināšanas arī savā darbā, risina dažādus noziegumus.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Karls Albergs pārceļas uz klusu piekrastes pilsētiņu, jo ir noguris no policijas darba lielpilsētā. Tomēr viņam nākas izmantot visas prasmes, lai izmeklētu slepkavības, kas arvien turpina notikt.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Viktorijas laikmeta Londonā skaistā un gudrā Elaiza Skārleta pēc tēva nāves pēkšņi attopas viena un bez naudas. Taču viņa nekrīt izmisumā un nolemj pārņemt tēva privātdetektīva aģentūru. Taču sievietei nav viegli izcīnīt savu vietu profesijā, kurā dominē vīrieši. Nereti viņai nākas izmeklējamās lietas zagt no tēva protežē, policijas inspektora Viljama Velingtona, galda. Lai arī Velingtonu kaitina Elaizas vēlme strādāt par privātdetektīvi, ar laiku viņš sāk novērtēt viņas prasmes un aso prātu. Elaiza un Velingtons nepārtraukti ķildojas, taču patiesībā viņu vidū virmo dziļas jūtas, un viņiem nāksies kopīgi izmeklēt arī kādu sarežģītu ar Elaizas tēvu saistītu noslēpumu.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Zigfrīds un Tristans atstāti Skeldeilas namā par saimniekiem, kamēr Holas kundze tiekas ar savu dēlu. Zigfrīds ieceļ Tristanu par mājas darbu darītāju. Praksē ierodas praktikants Endrū Simondss. Tristans sagaida katastrofu, ņemot vērā savu pieredzi par Zigfrīda audzināšanas metodēm, bet Zigfrīdam izdodas rast saikni ar jauno Endrū, un Tristans jūtas aizvainots. Helēnas māsa Dženija pavēsta, ka ir pametusi skolu, un Helēna jūt, ka vairs nav daļa no savas bijušās ģimenes. Tomēr atgadījums ar kādu aitu liek abām labāk novērtēt vienai otru.
