This season on Air Crash Investigation: Conflicting stories emerge after a Swedish cargo plane spirals to the ground; an African airliner crashes in the wilderness and the cause proves too sinister to be believed; and, when a Pakistani passenger jet disappears on approach to Kathmandu, Nepalese investigators must determine how it ended up on a crash course with the Himalayas.

programme.title: Destruction Decoded
programme.desc: This series will go back through the record to explore life-altering, earth-shattering, unforgettable events using a combination of carefully selected archive, cutting edge CGI and informative scripting in this popular science format. As well as exploring spectacular archive, illustrating the full toll these disasters can take, well dig into the science behind each event, shining a light on the most fascinating elements and giving an understanding on how and why these events occur.

programme.title: Destruction Decoded
programme.desc: Every year, thousands of train crashes and devastating plane disasters occur worldwide. From hijackings to technological failures, these incidents highlight the inherent dangers of travel. Despite daily advancements, a single mistake can lead to catastrophic outcomes. Join us as we explore the 10 most significant air crashes and train accidents, uncovering the tragic events that capture global attention and impact countless lives.

programme.title: Seconds from Disaster
programme.desc: In February 1998 a US Marine Corps prowler jet took off for a routine training mission through the Italian Alps. On the final leg of its flight the aircrafts right wing sliced through the supporting cable of a ski gondola filled with tourists. The gondola plummeted over 100m to the valley floor and all 20 passengers perished. The prowler jet was severely damaged but the pilot made it back the 90kilometres to their base. Seconds from Disaster investigates the causes and repercussions of the crash and speaks exclusively with a member of the aircrew who, alongside the investigators and victims families, are all still haunted by this tragedy.

programme.title: Seconds from Disaster
programme.desc: The Deepwater Horizon rig has finished drilling the Macondo Well for BP in the Gulf of Mexico. The well, in water 1500m deep, extends to a depth of 4000m. The crew test the well to ensure it is safely sealed so the Deepwater Horizon rig can move on before another rig starts oil extraction. But just hours after the well passes its safety test, flammable gas and crude oil shoot out of the well, enveloping the rig in flames and killing 11 workers. Seconds from Disaster investigates the series of decisions and failings that culminated in the catastrophe and the worlds biggest accidental marine oil spill.

programme.title: The Story of God with Morgan Freeman
programme.desc: Violent cataclysms and fiery judgment fixate the popular imagination and fill numerous holy books. Morgan Freeman looks into this supposed future as well as past millennia of strife to determine how the world will end. His journey takes him to the desert that three faiths call home to pour over the Dead Sea Scrolls, and learn about the origins of the Jewish messiah. He decodes the enigmatic Mark of the Beast-666-in Rome, and sits down with a reformed Islamic terrorist. He travels to Guatemala to determine if the ancient Maya really predicted the end of the world, and learns from a psychologist why some people find comfort in catastrophes. On the brighter side, a visit with Hurricane Katrina survivors and a meditative session with one of the holiest men in all of Buddhism begins to realign Morgans perspective-what if the apocalypse is not a planetary bloodbath, but rather a mental paradigm shift?

programme.title: The Story of God with Morgan Freeman
programme.desc: Where does evil come from? In a maximum-security prison, Morgan comes face to face with a serial killer, and looks for the physical root of evil in his brain. In an ancient tomb, Egyptologist Salima Ikram shows Morgan a depiction of the "weighing of the heart", and the birth of the belief that what you did in this life mattered in the next. Psychologist Jesse Bering has discovered that children who believe they are being watching by an invisible being obey the rules more than those who dont. Morgan encounters Zoroastrianism, whose belief in a cosmic balance of good and evil inspired the Christian Devil. In India, he discovers that Hindu believes evil stems from the tormented souls of ones ancestors, who are merely in need of release. Morgan explores the idea of redemption, when he former Neo-Nazi skinhead Bryon Widner, who turned his back on a life of evil.

programme.title: Buried Secrets of the Bible with Albert Lin
programme.desc: The story of Moses and the Parting of the Red Sea is one of the best-known stories in the Bible, but did any of it actually happen? Scientist Albert Lin goes on an incredible adventure, hunting for clues amongst the most amazing sites in ancient Egypt. He uses the latest satellite technology to find the truth about what might really have happened. Along the way he meets some of the worlds leading archaeologists and Biblical scholars.

programme.title: Buried Secrets of the Bible with Albert Lin
programme.desc: The destruction of Sodom and Gomorrah is the Bibles greatest disaster story. But could it have been inspired by real events? Explorer and Scientist Albert Lin is on an epic mission to the Holy Lands to find out. He will solve this Biblical mystery in his own unique way - from space. Using space age tech, Albert will seek out answers amid fabulous ancient cities and reveal terrifying, destructive forces of nature.

programme.title: Strangest Things
programme.desc: Under the muck of a Danish bog, a 2,400-year-old body is found so perfectly preserved the stubble on the dead mans chin is visible … as is the rope around his neck. Is this ancient cold case what it seems? At the turn of the 20th century, physician Albert Abrams was inspired to apply the new discovery of radio waves to medicine. He invented a complex-looking machine to diagnose any disease. Thousands flocked to be tested, but the establishment was skeptical. At Berlins Neues Museum, a bust of Egypts Queen Nefertiti portrays a woman so stunning that she has become synonymous with flawless beauty. But when experts use advanced techniques to look beneath the surface, new questions are raised about the queens appearance.

programme.title: Strangest Things
programme.desc: The lost colony of Roanoke is a historic mystery that has not been solved for over 400 years. An intriguing artifact was discovered in 1937: the Dare Stone. Apparently written by John White, it explains in detail what happened to the vanished colony. But is it real? World War I was the first major conflict to feature warplanes and, therefore, also the first to feature anti-air defence. How did an object resembling a satellite dish on wheels help gunners shoot down enemy planes? In Egypt, excavations of the Great Sphinx of Giza in 1817 uncovered six carved hunks of stone. Put together, they appear to be fragments of a large, braided stone beard, in the style of false beards worn by ancient pharaohs. The Sphinx never wore a beard … or did it?

programme.title: Airport Security: Colombia
programme.desc: El Dorado International Airport officials must put their sagacity and experience to the test in order to detect the boldest and most original attempts at breaking the law that take place at the airport. In this episode, three passengers are caught carrying a total of 120 cocaine capsules inside their bodies and they in turn confess the dramatic circumstances they claim pushed them into committing a crime. Immigration agents face the challenge of deporting eight Bangladeshi nationals who are traveling using false documentation. Also, a young man shows great imagination when he hides a stash of cocaine in an unexpected part of his luggage. And a Dutch passenger dares to carry large quantities of cocaine in the fake bottom of both his suitcases. Meanwhile, customs officials work tirelessly to stop undeclared cash from entering the country, as it is sometimes linked to criminal activity.

programme.title: Airport Security: Peru and Brazil
programme.desc: This season features four episodes each at two of Latin Americas biggest airports: Lima, Perus Jorge Chavez and Brazils S?o Paulo-Guarulhos. Police are on high alert. Their main challenges: illegal immigration and the trafficking of cocaine. From hidden compartments and ingested capsules to fake documents, officers work 24/7 to protect their borders and stop criminals in their tracks. Watch the action from behind the scenes.

programme.title: The Next Mega Tsunami
programme.desc: Ten years after one of the most deadly tsunamis ever known, scientists are making a shocking discovery. Experts used to believe that the biggest killer waves were only generated in a handful of regions.

programme.title: Seconds from Disaster
programme.desc: Over two days in spring of 1996, 8 climbers died on the descent from Mount Everest. A fierce storm, hubris and ambition and a series of errors contributed to make this the deadliest day in the history of the mountain. On May 10th two competing commercial guided expeditions were making the ascent to Everest. Adventure Consultants led by New Zealand climbing veteran Rob Hall and Mountain Madness led by accomplished American climber Scott Fischer led clients, each of whom paid up to $65,000, to summit the peak. Dr Jeremy Windsor a leading expert on altitude will examine the dangers posed by climbing at such a high altitude where oxygen in the air is three times less than sea level, and reveals weather data that may have uniquely contributed to the tragedy

programme.title: Seconds from Disaster
programme.desc: The series investigates historically relevant human-made and natural disasters from the last century. Each episode is dedicated to a particular gruesome accident, every minute of which is thoroughly analyzed and studied in order to present the reasons for its occurrence and circumstances of it. The program uses re-enactments, interviews with witnesses and survivors, and CGI to show the viewers how it happened in reality. All this is done to draw viewers attention to these issues so that we make sure they wont happen again in the future.

programme.title: Seconds from Disaster
programme.desc: On a quiet Sunday morning in 1941 the pride of the US Navy rode calmly at anchor in the island paradise of Hawaii, far away from the war raging in Europe. That calm was abruptly shattered by the arrival of Imperial Japans carrier taskforce that, in an unprecedented surprise attack, killed thousands and destroyed the American battleships that stood between Japan and its desire for a Pacific empire. This "day of infamy" seemed to be the most successful pre-emptive strike in history and a disaster for the United States. But was it? Seconds from Disaster takes a fresh look at one of historys greatest events and investigates whether the attack was in fact a fatal blow to Japans quest for victory.

programme.title: Seconds from Disaster
programme.desc: Waco, Texas. On February 28th 1993 the Bureau of Alcohol Tobacco and Firearms raid a compound belonging to a religious cult called the Branch Davidians. They attempt to arrest cult leader David Koresh for alleged firearms offences. A gunfight breaks out that leaves six Branch Davidians and four ATF agents dead. The FBI arrives to take control but the situation escalates into one of the Americas longest sieges. After a fifty-one day stand off the FBI launches a dawn assault. Using military tanks they inject tear gas through the walls and windows in an attempt to force the Branch Davidians out. Besieged cult members refuse to surrender and a disastrous fire engulfs their compound in less than twenty minutes. Nearly 80 people including twenty-eight children were killed during the fire. [add] Seconds from Disaster counts down to the moment fire breaks out and investigates whether the Branch Davidians were led to their deaths by charismatic cult leader David Koresh or killed by murderous Federal agents.

programme.title: Strangest Things
programme.desc: Under the muck of a Danish bog, a 2,400-year-old body is found so perfectly preserved the stubble on the dead mans chin is visible … as is the rope around his neck. Is this ancient cold case what it seems? At the turn of the 20th century, physician Albert Abrams was inspired to apply the new discovery of radio waves to medicine. He invented a complex-looking machine to diagnose any disease. Thousands flocked to be tested, but the establishment was skeptical. At Berlins Neues Museum, a bust of Egypts Queen Nefertiti portrays a woman so stunning that she has become synonymous with flawless beauty. But when experts use advanced techniques to look beneath the surface, new questions are raised about the queens appearance.

Apparently written by John White, it explains in detail what happened to the vanished colony. But is it real? World War I was the first major conflict to feature warplanes and, therefore, also the first to feature anti-air defence. How did an object resembling a satellite dish on wheels help gunners shoot down enemy planes? In Egypt, excavations of the Great Sphinx of Giza in 1817 uncovered six carved hunks of stone. Put together, they appear to be fragments of a large, braided stone beard, in the style of false beards worn by ancient pharaohs. The Sphinx never wore a beard … or did it?

programme.title: Food Factory USA
programme.desc: On this episode of Food Factory USA: Make the pilgrimage to the Budweiser Brewing Companys St. Louis headquarters; meet the cryogenic processor behind Dippin Dots revolutionary ice cream beads; and visit the California bakery that turns out over 80,000 carrot cakes with cream-cheese icing every day

programme.title: Food Factory USA
programme.desc: On this episode of Food Factory USA: Meet the great grandson and learn the distilled secrets of legendary Kentucky bourbon maker Jim Beam; TruMoo chocolate milk is produced and blended by the chocolatey-delicious truckload; and more than a million of Tinas Burritos are hand-rolled every day - ole!

programme.title: Amsterdam Central 24/7
programme.desc: During the Dutch F1 Grand Prix, Amsterdam Central will have to deal with 60,000 racing fanatics. They will depart throughout the morning, but will all come back at the same time. For Traffic Control and the station employees, it is all hands-on deck to manage the enormous flow of people. While people are trying to prevent passenger congestion, the shops are waiting for their delayed goods.

programme.title: Amsterdam Central 24/7
programme.desc: Kings Day is the busiest day of the year at Amsterdam Central Station. While Ticket and Services employee Alexandra, and Station Manager Rene try to steer the crowds in the right direction, Assistant Manager Michel is busy coordinating the flow of goods due to a broken freight elevator. Meanwhile, officers Menno and Carolien revive a girl who has fallen ill.

programme.title: Inside Melbourne Airport
programme.desc: At Australias busiest airport which operates 24/7, a blackout halts operations and Resource Coordinator Andrew tries to restore power within an hour. Air Traffic Controller Melissa manages up to 700 daily plane movements. A flight must dump fuel and return to the airport after take-off due to a faulty engine warning.

programme.title: Inside Airport: Lost and Found
programme.desc: Travelers are reunited with lost treasures, including an expensive pair of vintage Air Jordans, sweaty boxing gear, and a beloved stuffed animal. In Tampa, the K9 unit is called in to ensure an abandoned bag does not contain explosives, and in Norfolk, the airports auction of lost items, including a van converted into a mobile barber shop, raises nearly $55,000.

programme.title: Toronto Airport Uncovered
programme.desc: Toronto Airport security teams are on high alert as intruders infiltrate restricted areas across the airfield and inside the terminal. A couple of wily coyotes find themselves on an active runway. Gate crew try to hunt down a passenger travelling with a deadly weapon, and theres a medical emergency on a plane just minutes from taking off.

programme.title: Engineering Europe
programme.desc: The UKs engineering wonders revealed: including innovative electric flying machines, ingenious skyscrapers, the secrets of Londons Tower Bridge, a 57 billion pound railway and a mega-stadium with a surprising historical twist.

programme.title: Engineering Europe
programme.desc: Explore the engineering wonders of Europes northernmost region, from Icelands epic lava-defying barriers to Finlands record-breaking vertical factory. This spectacular journey uncovers the Nordics boldest builds including the construction of the worlds largest wooden city and a Swedish ferry that doesnt just sail—it flies.

programme.title: Top Guns: The Next Generation
programme.desc: One students dreams of becoming a fighter pilot are put in jeopardy as the class starts advanced phase training with a set of breathtaking bombing tests. Diving at speeds theyve never faced before, students struggle with the dynamic moves and start to make high-risk mistakes. Instructors deliver tough assessments in the debriefs to keep the students safe.

programme.title: Top Guns: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Landing on an aircraft carrier demands precision flying and is a skill vital for all U.S. Navy fighter pilots. As the students tackle the longest and most technical section of the advanced phase, they know its a test they must pass to keep their dreams alive. The pressure mounts on some struggling students, and the commanding officer issues a timely warning to one.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Every time a plane crashes, the world takes notice. And so do the experts whose job it is to figure out what happened. Air Crash Investigation uncovers the truth behind the most legendary aviation disasters, and every episode features eyewitness accounts, captivating reenactments, state-of-the-art CGI, and interviews with the investigators who ultimately determined what went wrong. This season on Air Crash Investigation: Conflicting stories emerge after a Swedish cargo plane spirals to the ground; an African airliner crashes in the wilderness and the cause proves too sinister to be believed; and, when a Pakistani passenger jet disappears on approach to Kathmandu, Nepalese investigators must determine how it ended up on a crash course with the Himalayas.

programme.desc: Every time a plane crashes, the world takes notice. And so do the experts whose job it is to figure out what happened. Air Crash Investigation uncovers the truth behind the most legendary aviation disasters, and every episode features eyewitness accounts, captivating reenactments, state-of-the-art CGI, and interviews with the investigators who ultimately determined what went wrong. This season on Air Crash Investigation: Conflicting stories emerge after a Swedish cargo plane spirals to the ground; an African airliner crashes in the wilderness and the cause proves too sinister to be believed; and, when a Pakistani passenger jet disappears on approach to Kathmandu, Nepalese investigators must determine how it ended up on a crash course with the Himalayas.

programme.title: Disaster Autopsy
programme.desc: Three real world disasters forensically dissected, analysed and recreated in astonishing detail from expert analysis using all the evidence. How did a Titan II nuclear missile explode in its Arkansas silo? What flaw made the sinking of the ferry Estonia the worst European maritime disaster since Titanic? Why did the oil rig Piper Alpha explode; the most lethal offshore accident in history?

programme.title: Disaster Autopsy
programme.desc: Three real world disasters forensically analysed and recreated in astonishing detail from expert analysis and all the evidence. Why did the Surfside condo block in Miami collapse on its sleeping residents? What caused the lethal fire in Kings Cross subway station when it was packed with commuters? Why did Russias Kursk nuclear submarine sink without warning?

programme.title: X-Ray Earth
programme.desc: Beneath our feet, under trillions of tons of rock, lurk astonishing and deadly secrets. Earthquakes, tsunamis, volcanic eruptions are all driven by hidden forces deep inside our planet. Now, using the latest scientific data from sensors and surface scans, we can x-ray the earth to reveal the dangers locked inside our planet.Using thousands of sensors and state of the art surface scan information, for the first time, we can create x-rays of the deep interior of our planet.

programme.title: X-Ray Earth
programme.desc: Beneath our feet, under trillions of tons of rock, lurk astonishing and deadly secrets. Earthquakes, tsunamis, volcanic eruptions are all driven by hidden forces deep inside our planet. Now, using the latest scientific data from sensors and surface scans, we can x-ray the earth to reveal the dangers locked inside our planet.Using thousands of sensors and state of the art surface scan information, for the first time, we can create x-rays of the deep interior of our planet.

programme.title: The Jesus Mysteries
programme.desc: Jesus Christ is one of the most famous names in the history of mankind. He is the core of belief for millions of Christians worldwide and his story has provided rich material for thousands of books and films. But the Gospel writers dont tell us much about his life, and even crucial events like the Nativity, the Miracles and even the Crucifixion have been adapted, embellished and rewritten over the course of hundreds of years. The Jesus Mysteries will re-examine the crucial elements of his story and question basic modern assumptions to reveal some surprising and often shocking details about his life and ministry.

programme.title: Secrets of Christs Tomb: Explorer Special
programme.desc: In this 60 minute Nat Geo Explorer Special, we follow world leading experts on a quest to unlock the mysteries surrounding the Tomb of Christ. At the heart of the story a team of leading scientists use the latest scientific techniques to restore the edicule housing the tomb. Scientific tests indicate the remnants of the tomb dates to 4th century - a discovery that could revolutionise what we know about the tomb of Christ.

programme.title: Riddles of the Bible
programme.desc: The Bible and the understanding of its prophetic word has been debated, contested and fought over for thousands of years. Even in modern times, the riddles of the Bible remain. Why is the story of Cain and Abel such a powerful one and what is the dark mystery surrounding it? Is there a scientific way to confirm the story of Noah and the Ark, or was it just that?a story? How did David, and subsequently his son, Solomon, propel a nation?or did they at all? Esteemed archeologists, biblical scholars, historians, among others, come together to explore these riddles and seek the ever elusive answers.

programme.title: The Story of God with Morgan Freeman
programme.desc: What are miracles, and what might they mean? Morgan goes to Manhattan to meet a man who fell 47 stories and lived, and to Jerusalem, where he learns at Passover that miracles are the foundation of the Jewish faith. In Rome, he discovers how the Vatican makes saints through their miracles, and how ancient Romans believed the gods controlled every aspect of their lives. He explores the Chinese tradition of Daoism, in which miracles can happen because our lives are connected by a universal energy. Is a psychologist correct when he says miracles could be nothing more than random chance? Or could miracles come from the power of our minds? Cancer survivor Tom Renfro claims his recovery stemmed from the power of prayer. In India, at the site where the Buddha attained enlightenment, Morgan discovers that Buddhists believe all of us are capable of miracles, if we focus our minds.

programme.title: The Tale of Sylian
programme.desc: Nikola, a farmer grappling with the harsh reality of new economic policies, is unable to sell his land or crops. When his family leaves in search of a better life abroad, he takes a job as a landfill attendant, where he encounters the injured white stork Silyan. As Nikola nurses the bird back to health, an unlikely bond forms between man and animal.

programme.title: Destruction Decoded
programme.desc: This series will go back through the record to explore life-altering, earth-shattering, unforgettable events using a combination of carefully selected archive, cutting edge CGI and informative scripting in this popular science format. As well as exploring spectacular archive, illustrating the full toll these disasters can take, well dig into the science behind each event, shining a light on the most fascinating elements and giving an understanding on how and why these events occur.

programme.title: Destruction Decoded
programme.desc: This series will go back through the record to explore life-altering, earth-shattering, unforgettable events using a combination of carefully selected archive, cutting edge CGI and informative scripting in this popular science format. As well as exploring spectacular archive, illustrating the full toll these disasters can take, well dig into the science behind each event, shining a light on the most fascinating elements and giving an understanding on how and why these events occur.

programme.title: Construction Fails
programme.desc: An overpass on Philadelphias busy Interstate- 95 highway sets ablaze after a tanker truck rollover. Fails include the worlds most powerful radio telescope collapse, a swanky New York City skyscraper with a tall list of problems, a sinking airport in Japan, a whole lot of collapses in Nigeria, plus a museum renovation with a vision thats not quite crystal clear.

programme.title: Construction Fails
programme.desc: Was the tragedy of the space shuttle Columbia baked into the original design? A wave of ship strikes has Chinas bridge builders working overtime. Temporary stages are easy to put up and easy to take down, but sometimes they come down at the wrong time: suddenly and all at once. Check out hotels that tumble; take a tour of some of the worlds most expensive and useless airports, and learn why a Shanghai apartment tower dropped like a slab.

programme.title: Disaster Autopsy
programme.desc: Three real world disasters forensically dissected, analysed and recreated in astonishing detail from expert analysis using all the evidence. How did a Titan II nuclear missile explode in its Arkansas silo? What flaw made the sinking of the ferry Estonia the worst European maritime disaster since Titanic? Why did the oil rig Piper Alpha explode; the most lethal offshore accident in history?

programme.title: Disaster Autopsy
programme.desc: Three real world disasters forensically analysed and recreated in astonishing detail from expert analysis and all the evidence. Why did the Surfside condo block in Miami collapse on its sleeping residents? What caused the lethal fire in Kings Cross subway station when it was packed with commuters? Why did Russias Kursk nuclear submarine sink without warning?

programme.title: Inside Airport: Lost and Found
programme.desc: Travelers are reunited with lost treasures, including an expensive pair of vintage Air Jordans, sweaty boxing gear, and a beloved stuffed animal. In Tampa, the K9 unit is called in to ensure an abandoned bag does not contain explosives, and in Norfolk, the airports auction of lost items, including a van converted into a mobile barber shop, raises nearly $55,000.

programme.title: Inside Melbourne Airport
programme.desc: At Australias busiest airport which operates 24/7, a blackout halts operations and Resource Coordinator Andrew tries to restore power within an hour. Air Traffic Controller Melissa manages up to 700 daily plane movements. A flight must dump fuel and return to the airport after take-off due to a faulty engine warning.

programme.title: Inside Sydney Airport
programme.desc: Lightning has struck an incoming international flight. Engineers assess the damage, as passengers become increasingly impatient. High winds lead to runway closures, adding pressure to flight schedules. Another plane arrives with potentially dangerous liquid leaking from its cargo. 3 ground crew who came in contact are quarantined until fire services can identify the liquid.

programme.title: Port Security: Hamburg
programme.desc: The Port of Hamburg is the key hub for Germanys import and export business so invariably smugglers from all over the world try to take advantage of this to channel drugs, weapons and pirated products. We will follow customs officers targeted operations from suspicious freight going out to its impounding in Hamburg. We will be given exclusive insights into the work of Germanys most successful customs office and its confiscation of drugs and goods.

programme.title: Zombie Animals
programme.desc: Alien Invaders. Welcome to the weird world of alien invaders. From zombie moose, to a louse that replaces the tongue of a fish and a parasite that takes over the eyestalks of a snail.

programme.title: Land of the Iberian Lynx
programme.desc: Spring rains bring new opportunities and hope to the land of the Iberian lynx.

programme.title: Croc Wars: Grumeti Vs Mara
programme.desc: Each year, nearly two million wildebeest and zebra cross the Serengeti on a quest for fresh grazing. But two legendary rivers stand in their way—the Grumeti and the Mara—each ruled by a formidable dynasty of Nile crocodiles. In "Croc Wars," follow these ancient predators as they prepare for the feast of the year, but not all crocodiles are created equal. In the deep, fast waters of the Mara, privilege reigns, kills come easy, and food is plentiful. In the rugged Grumeti, crocodiles must outwit, adapt and fight for every scrap. From brutal ambushes to stolen kills, this is a high-stakes battle for survival on two rivers with two strategies and only one chance to eat.

programme.title: Reptile Planet
programme.desc: Skittering, swimming and even gliding, over 12,000 species of reptiles roam the world. Crocs, turtles, snakes and lizards have ancestors as old as the dinosaurs and evolution as their friend. These cold-blooded creatures have adapted in clever and lethal ways, from armoured skin and poisonous venom to record-breaking bite force and even blood squirting eyes. This is Reptile Planet!

programme.title: Python Invasion
programme.desc: Scientists and hunters team up to fight one of the biggest ecological threats to the Florida Everglades: the Burmese python. In the 1990s, pet pythons were released into the wild and have eaten their way through the food chain. Today, nobody knows how many there are, but estimates may be in the hundreds of thousands. We follow the scientists as they track, gather data, and try to understand better how Pythons reproduce and adapt in the Everglades. Ian Bartoszerk and his team at the Conservancy of Southwest Florida use male scout snakes to lead them to females with the potential to lay up to eighty eggs at a time. At the U.S.G.S., Amy Yackle and Mark Sandfoss work in tandem with wildlife biologists from the National Park Service and the University of Florida to battle female reproduction on another front — Alligator Alley.

programme.title: Europes Wild Marvels
programme.desc: Coasts. From the frozen Arctic Ocean, where polar bears and reindeer battle for survival, to the warm beaches of the Mediterranean, home to pink flamingos and killer corals, Europes coastline attracts a staggering array of wildlife.

programme.title: Croc Wars: Grumeti Vs Mara
programme.desc: Each year, nearly two million wildebeest and zebra cross the Serengeti on a quest for fresh grazing. But two legendary rivers stand in their way—the Grumeti and the Mara—each ruled by a formidable dynasty of Nile crocodiles. In "Croc Wars," follow these ancient predators as they prepare for the feast of the year, but not all crocodiles are created equal. In the deep, fast waters of the Mara, privilege reigns, kills come easy, and food is plentiful. In the rugged Grumeti, crocodiles must outwit, adapt and fight for every scrap. From brutal ambushes to stolen kills, this is a high-stakes battle for survival on two rivers with two strategies and only one chance to eat.

programme.title: Reptile Planet
programme.desc: Skittering, swimming and even gliding, over 12,000 species of reptiles roam the world. These cold-blooded creatures have adapted in clever and lethal ways, from armoured skin and poisonous venom to record-breaking bite force and even blood squirting eyes. This is Reptile Planet!

programme.title: Animal Fight Club
programme.desc: "Animal Fight Club: Power Struggles" reveals how the even the most epic battles can be won or lost in a split second. In the world of wild animal fights, nothing is ever certain. Whether an animal is fighting for food, shelter or for survival itself, there are no guarantees. Sometimes even strength of numbers is not enough. In this episode we see a female leopard fight a bigger male for her lunch and her life, discover the complex competition amongst the worlds largest Great Apes and see how a Nile Monitor Lizard can turn its tail into a show stopping weapon.

programme.title: Winters Hidden Wonders
programme.desc: Winter is the most punishing of seasons, a time of year when many animals seek shelter in order to hibernate, but others must face the harshness of their environment. This documentary series showcases the ruthless beauty of this icy season, revealing the animals who thrive in their freezing conditions and the animals who simply fight for survival. When the season finally passes spring is reborn, and it is a celebration for those who managed to survive unscathed.

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: The Pols new livestock arent potty trained; their sheep hut isnt draining properly and has now been transformed into a Pee Palace. Its late fall and the winter deep freeze is just around the corner, so the family needs to get it fixed fast. The Pols also get a new sheep for their farm.

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: The Pol clan gets to work on creating Beths dream garden. To beat the incoming rainstorm, an exhausted Ben works around the clock to finish building the gardens pond and waterfall. Noticing her brother is near his breaking point, Beth plans a special surprise to lift his spirits.

programme.title: Out There with Jack Randall
programme.desc: At the tender age of 14, Jack Randall left his home in the UK to work under the guidance of legendary wildlife expert Steve Irwin. Developing his skills of handling reptiles and snakes, Randall learned important skills under Irwins tutelage that remain with him today. Now an accomplished zoologist, Randall is continuing his studies into wild and exotic species, visiting harsh landscapes and unrelenting environments to explore these animals behaviours. Using his bold and courageous approach, Randall gets up close and personal with deadly snakes, vicious crocodiles, boisterous kangaroos, fierce camels and many other dangerous species.

programme.title: Kingdom of the Polar Bears
programme.desc: As the Arctic changes faster than ever, a team of polar bear guides prepares for an epic journey; a first-ever attempt to follow the bears on the sea ice of Hudson Bay. In this high-stakes high-reward venture, they will document the secret world of bears, a mysterious and disappearing realm that is the bears key to survival. Life on the ice is a critical time for these bears. It also remains undocumented, deemed too dangerous for humans to follow, hinted at only through aerial reconnaissance and satellite collar research. The team, armed with traditional ecological knowledge and the latest 4K camera technology, will witness never- before-seen seal hunting strategies and document rapid adaptations to climate change, including whale predation and open-water hunting.

programme.title: Cheetahs Up Close with Bertie Gregory
programme.desc: Bertie arrives in the Serengeti as the spectacular wildebeest migration kicks off. Hes here to film the fastest land animal on Earth: the cheetah. He gets close to a mother caring for her tiny cubs and a young group of males executing phenomenal hunts as a team, and learns about the unexpected challenges the species face.

programme.title: Out There with Jack Randall

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Reality show follows Dutch-born veterinarian Jan Pol, his family and employees everyday. Jan Pol and his wife Diane started their own practice in Weidman, Michigan, Pol Veterinary Services, back in in 1981. Dr Pol takes a good care of every family pet and head of livestock no matter what size or condition and is a true legend in the community. Dr Pol has seen it all, treating numerous patients every single day, his daily routine is more than 12 hours but nothing can stop him from being devoted to his patients.

programme.title: Australias Wild Woodlands
programme.desc: "Australias Wild Woodlands" explores the rich biodiversity and resilience of Australias eucalyptus forests, home to the worlds largest variety of parrots and iconic species like the platypus. These woodlands span vast regions and support diverse wildlife, from red kangaroos to freshwater crocodiles. The film showcases the rare behaviors of marsupials and birds, highlighting threats from climate change and land clearing. Ancient ecosystems remain largely unchanged since the dinosaurs, but species like the Gouldian finch face uncertain futures. Through intimate storytelling, the documentary reveals the ecological importance and fragility of these vibrant landscapes.

programme.title: Worlds Deadliest Animals
programme.desc: From the National Geographic, this documentary series explores the deadliest animals that inhabit out planet. We travel around the globe to numerous different countries, continents and ecosystems, revealing the most dangerous animals in each location. Whether its the fearsome lions of Africa, the tyrannical tigers of India, the Amazons menacing giant anaconda, or the frightening creatures that lurk in our seas and oceans, this fascinating series with stunning cinematography takes a look at each creature in great detail, revealing how each one can be so deadly.

programme.title: Crocodile - Australias Greatest Survivor
programme.desc: In Australia, dominant saltwater crocodiles, called ""boss crocs," are the largest and most powerful animals on the continent. Even after unrelenting human pressure on their very survival, they are still the masters of their world. Over the last 200 years, the impact of human activities—such as commercial hunting, agriculture and population growth—pushed them to the brink of extinction. Today, these "boss crocs" have continued to not only survive but thrive.

programme.title: Dolphins Up Close with Bertie Gregory
programme.desc: Bertie Gregory is in the Azores, a marine sanctuary and vital pitstop for migrating ocean predators off the coast of Portugal. Its feeding season, as thousands of normally elusive predators join forces to hunt and feed on super-shoals of fish known as bait balls. A vast ocean and battling storms challenge the team for a chance to film the most spectacular feeding frenzy of Berties career.

programme.title: Winters Hidden Wonders

When the season finally passes spring is reborn, and it is a celebration for those who managed to survive unscathed.

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: The Pols rush to prepare for their farms first Michigan winter. The family goes into hyperdrive to fix the pasture fence and finish building the garden hardscape before the first snow falls. Beth is worried about the bees, so she brings in some expert help to hopefully ensure their survival.

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: Its winter on the farm, and the Pols are adding to their flock! The family is bringing in four merino ewes that were recently bred, which means with any luck the farm could be expecting its first lambs come springtime. And as winter fades into spring, the Pols prepare for the new arrivals by building a lambing pen. Meanwhile, Beth checks if her bees survived the winter.

programme.title: Oceans Weirdest
programme.desc: Tune in, meet some of the strangest and most unique creatures that live in our oceans, and discover how they find their mates, food, and how they adapt, thrive and survive. Take a deep breath and dive into the water as we introduce you to the Oceans Weirdest!

Dr Pol has seen it all, treating numerous patients every single day, his daily routine is more than 12 hours but nothing can stop him from being devoted to his patients.

programme.title: Paradise Islands: Compilation
programme.desc: Wild, Weird and Wonderful. From tree-climbing kangaroos to boxing pigs, rivers of fire and even, fish that run away from water, discover what makes the islands between Asia and Australia so wild, weird, and wonderful!

programme.title: Worlds Weirdest
programme.desc: Worlds Weirdest is a documentary series revolving around the strangest, freakiest, weirdest animals and their behaviors in the animal kingdom. Take this amazing journey to the animal world and have a look at creatures who survive in extreme environments, alien-looking body parts and camouflage, fish that can change its sex, toads that explode, koalas and their disgusting diet and all kinds of other weirdest creatures Mother Nature has to offer.

programme.title: Oceans Weirdest
programme.desc: Tune in, meet some of the strangest and most unique creatures that live in our oceans, and discover how they find their mates, food, and how they adapt, thrive and survive. Take a deep breath and dive into the water as we introduce you to the Oceans Weirdest!

programme.title: Worlds Deadliest Animals
programme.desc: From the National Geographic, this documentary series explores the deadliest animals that inhabit out planet. We travel around the globe to numerous different countries, continents and ecosystems, revealing the most dangerous animals in each location. Whether its the fearsome lions of Africa, the tyrannical tigers of India, the Amazons menacing giant anaconda, or the frightening creatures that lurk in our seas and oceans, this fascinating series with stunning cinematography takes a look at each creature in great detail, revealing how each one can be so deadly.

programme.title: Oceans Weirdest
programme.desc: Tune in, meet some of the strangest and most unique creatures that live in our oceans, and discover how they find their mates, food, and how they adapt, thrive and survive. Take a deep breath and dive into the water as we introduce you to the Oceans Weirdest!

programme.title: Winters Hidden Wonders
programme.desc: Winter is the most punishing of seasons, a time of year when many animals seek shelter in order to hibernate, but others must face the harshness of their environment. This documentary series showcases the ruthless beauty of this icy season, revealing the animals who thrive in their freezing conditions and the animals who simply fight for survival. When the season finally passes spring is reborn, and it is a celebration for those who managed to survive unscathed.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Zābaciņš vēlas priecāties Banānsvētkos, bet tos draud izjaukt Guavas geizera izvirdums! Dorai jāaptur geizers un jāglābj svētki. Īgnais Trollis aizbēg no bildēšanās! Dora dodas viņam līdzi Troļļu pasaulē, lai pierunātu viņu nofotografēties.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Doras draugi krabīši grasās precēties, bet Garnadzis nočiepj gredzenu un pazaudē to okeānā. Dora dodas to meklēt. Dora un Zābaciņš satiek vikuņu Vikiju, kura pazaudējusi savu burvju flautu un nevar atgriezties Mākoņu valstībā.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Dvīņi ciemojas Barbagudrā istabā. Kādus sapņus sasniegtu, ja es būtu miljardieris?

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Ceļojumā uz Parīzi ģimene apskatīs lielisko Luvru. Diemžēl Barbalala neievēro strikto noteikumu - muzejā neēst. // Barbalala strikti ievēro ačgārnās dienas tradīcijas, kas cēlušās no seniem laikiem. Brāļi un māsas pievienojas viņai ačgārnajā dienā.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Vērojot zvaignzes Barbatētis un Lolita pamana lidojošo šķivīti un steidz pamodināt visu ģimeni. Izrādās, ka ciemos atlidojuši draugi, kuriem līdzi ir lielkājains mazulis, kurš pēkšņi uzradās viņu planētā. Ģimene ar kosmosa kuģi dodas mazuļa planētas meklējumos. // Barbatētis cer, ka viņi drīz atradīs mazuļa planētu. Bet ne viss iet pēc plāna un viņi nolaižas uz ļoti dīvainas planētas. Kā viņi tiks prom un vai atradīs mazuļa planētu?

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Bērniem ir garlaicīgi, jo ārā līst lietus. Bet vecāki zina, ka vajag tikai nedaudz iztēles, lai varētu izklaidēties aŗī lietū. Bērniem iztēle ir lieliska, varbūt pat pārāk... // Barbagudrais radīja dekoderi, kurš spēj iztulkot dzīvnieku skaņas, bet dzīvnieki fermā un pagalmā neko interesantu nesaka. Barbazū lūdz iztulkot okeāna iemītnieku valodu.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbagudrais uztvēris melodiju no Marsa. Barbapapas būvē raķeti, lai dotos uz sarkano planētu.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Karla jaunā restorāna būvdarbos notiek paukšķīgs pavērsiens. Rabls un viņa komanda ķeras pie uzkopšanas. Ziepains negadījums izraisa slidenas sekas visā Celtnieklīcī. Vai suņuki paspēs tās novērst pirms mēres Greitvejas lielā lēciena?

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Celtnieklīcis gaida iemīļotas TV zvaigznes jauno filmu. Bet vispirms vajadzīgs kinoteātris, kur to skatīties! Vectēvs pastāsta suņukiem par apslēptiem dārgumiem. Lai tos atrastu, komandai jāstrādā ķepu ķepā!

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims cenšas būt divos pasākumos reizē. Tims meklē Kajai uzkodu bez purvzāles. Pēc vairākiem zaudējumiem Tija cenšas uzvarēt visās ballīšu spēlēs.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Bizonu bars migrē caur Celtnieklīci un traucas tieši pretī Rātsnamam. Rabla komanda izmanto lielos braucamos, lai glābtu pilsētu. Komanda izmanto milzīgos braucamos, lai palīdzētu Lūkasam un Lilijai dāvāt vecākiem lieliskāko kāzu gadadienu.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Netālu no Celtnieklīča parka reindžere Roza un Rabla komanda atklāj meteorītu. Kad Ātrmeistars un Megameistars mēģina to piesavināties, ķepaiņi izmanto savus milzīgos braucamos, lai izglābtu pilsētu un nogādātu meteorītu uz Zinātnes centru.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora, Zābaciņš un Karte palīdz tēvocim Tesoro atrast pazaudētos dārgumu pēddziņus un atkal kļūt par dārgumu karti. Dora un Zābaciņš pēta noslēpumainu atslēgu, lai iepazītu Doras vecvecvecmāmiņu - pašu pirmo zinātkāro pētnieci.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Vecākus pārsteidz aizvien vairāku reklāmas izkārtņu parādīšanās gar viņu ceļu. Gaisma no reklāmām ir tik spoža, ka naktī vairs nevar saskatīt zvaigznes un visur ir tik daudz stabu! Pietiks! Ģimenei jārīkojas! // Barbalala vēlas kļūt par kovbojmeiteni un Barbazū ir apņēmies viņai palīdzēt. Lai to panāktu, viņai jāiemācās aprūpēt govis un bulli. Tas nav viegli, bet, ja viņa pacentīsies, viņa būs lieliska kovbojmeitene.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbagudrais pastāsta pārējiem, cik vareni bija Da Vinči izgudrojumi un nu katrs grib izgudrot ko savu. Ģēniju ir maz, bet ir jautri izgudrot. // Bērniem jāizvēlas - doties baseinā vai izbraukt ar riteņiem. Uzreiz izveidojas divas frontes un tikai Barbazū spēj nosvērt izvēles svarus.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs un Tija apmaldās izklaides centrā. Tims meklē jaunu, sev piemērotu raķeti. Kad Terija pieskata bērnus, Tims cenšas apiet visus noteikumus.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad Ātrmeistars nozog Rabla komandas autobusu, ķepaiņiem tas jāatgūst, lai paspētu uz Sjerras Spīdošās koncertu. Celtnieklīcī ir lieliska diena pludmalei! Rabla komandai jābūvē glābēju tornis, lai pludmalē būtu aboslūti droši.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Pēc tam, kad Ātrmeistars uzbūvējis nedrošu rotaļlaukumu, Rabla komandai jādomā radoši un jāuzbūvē jauns laukums no veciem materiāliem.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Arvien jauni piedzīvojumi ar Doru! Piebiedrojies drošajai pētniecei Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu brīnumainajos piedzīvojumos - no došanās palīgā dzīvniekiem kopā ar Djego līdz apburtas nāru pasaules glābšanai.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Jauni piedzīvojumi ar DORU! Pievienojies drošajai pasaules pētītājai Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu kopīgajos ceļojumos pa maģisko lietusmežu, kurā var notikt - un notiek - brīnumu lietas. Lets go!

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs un Tija apmaldās izklaides centrā. Tims meklē jaunu, sev piemērotu raķeti. Kad Terija pieskata bērnus, Tims cenšas apiet visus noteikumus.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Cūciņa Pepa ir mīļa, ziņkārīga un aktīva pirmsskolniece, kura kopā ar māmiņu, tēti un brālīti Džordžu ik dienu uzzina daudz ko jaunu un aizraujošu. Pepas iecienītākās nodarbes ir rotaļāšanās, pārģērbšanās un lēkāšana pa dubļainām peļķēm, un viņas jautrie piedzīvojumi vienmēr beidzas ar skaļiem smieklu rukšķiem.

programme.title: Haizivsuns
programme.desc: Haizivsuns domā, ka neiederas ne ar suņiem, ne haizivīm, ne cilvēkiem, bet Makss viņu uzmundrina.

programme.title: Haizivsuns
programme.desc: Makss ir ieplānojis jautru dienu ar Haizivsuni, bet Haizivsuns ir izklaidīgs, jo ir atradis karti, kas var aizvest pie citiem haizivsuņiem!

programme.title: Haizivsuns
programme.desc: Haizivsuns ir apņēmies uzzināt, no kurienes ir nācis, bet dīvaini laika apstākļi un mežonīgas jūras traucē viņam ar komandu atrast citus haizivsuņus

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un suņi mēģina uzbūvēt lielu riteņu veikalu līdz Riteņu Festivālam... varbūt Ātrmeistars viņus apsteigs! Kad Motore atsakās iet vannā pirms ģimenes fotografēšanās, Rablam un suņiem jāatrod risinājums.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad vējaina diena traucē būvēt saldējuma veikalu, Rabls, Miksa un Čārdžers ķeras pie darba. Rātsnamā kaut kas mistiski čīkst. Mērs Greitveja lūdz Rablam un Čārdžeram to atrast un salabot pirms viņas runas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Ir Tanšu diena! Vai ķepaiņi paspēs uzbūvēt dāvanu tantei Celtnei?

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbagudrais pastāsta pārējiem, cik vareni bija Da Vinči izgudrojumi un nu katrs grib izgudrot ko savu. programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbabērni sagatavo izrādi Barbamammai dzimšanas dienā. Kamēr Barbalala uzkopj, viņi sodas uz lunaparku, kur Barbabo iesprūst karuselī. Trīs atsevišķi stāsti saplūst kopā pagalma vidū.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs un Tija atrod pazudušu rotaļlietu un sola atgriezt to saimniekam. Kaja gaida, kad brauks ar Nebulatoru, bet Tims nav drošs. Tims un Kaja cenšas nofotografēt maldinošu Kosmosa vaboli.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims, Kaja un Tomijs cenšas dabūt laukā bumbu no mammas istabas.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Cūciņa Pepa ir mīļa, ziņkārīga un aktīva pirmsskolniece, kura kopā ar māmiņu, tēti un brālīti Džordžu ik dienu uzzina daudz ko jaunu un aizraujošu. Pepas iecienītākās nodarbes ir rotaļāšanās, pārģērbšanās un lēkāšana pa dubļainām peļķēm, un viņas jautrie piedzīvojumi vienmēr beidzas ar skaļiem smieklu rukšķiem.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbagudrais pastāsta pārējiem, cik vareni bija Da Vinči izgudrojumi un nu katrs grib izgudrot ko savu. Ģēniju ir maz, bet ir jautri izgudrot. // Bērniem jāizvēlas - doties baseinā vai izbraukt ar riteņiem. Uzreiz izveidojas divas frontes un tikai Barbazū spēj nosvērt izvēles svarus.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbapapas nolemj doties uz parku. Kamēr brālis un māsa spēlējas, Barbaliba mēģina visu kontrolēt.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Vasarā pilsētā ir ļoti karsti un komandas uzdevums ir to atvēsināt ar akvaparku.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora un Zābaciņš lūdz jauno lietus mākonīti Klaudiju piepildīt izžuvušu ūdens slidkalniņu. Zābaciņam piemetas astiņkute, kuru var izārstēt burvju vardīte - ja vien nopelnīs savas burvju svītras, palīdzot draugiem lietusmežā.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora un Zābaciņš palīdz rumpuļiem pagatavot troļļa džemu, pirms Īgnais Trollis pārrodas, lai našķētos. Dorai un Zābaciņam jāatrod un jānoliek vietā burvju kaķītis, kurš visiem draugiem liek uzvesties kā kaķiem!

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbagudrais pastāsta pārējiem, cik vareni bija Da Vinči izgudrojumi un nu katrs grib izgudrot ko savu. Ģēniju ir maz, bet ir jautri izgudrot. // Bērniem jāizvēlas - doties baseinā vai izbraukt ar riteņiem. Uzreiz izveidojas divas frontes un tikai Barbazū spēj nosvērt izvēles svarus.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Tētis paskaidro Barbabravo un Barbalalai, ka viņi var spēlēties, kā vēlas, bet bērni nesaprot, ka tētis neļāva viņiem kļūt par maziem dumpiniekiem. // Kas ir Barbapapas? Viņi ir dažādās krāsās, spēj transformēties, daži ir spalvaini. Atbildi var atras tikai Barbazinātne.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbalala rīko lielo talantu konkursu. Katram barbabērnam uz skatuves jādemonstrē savs lielākais talants, nekādas nīkuļošanas! // Videospēles ir jautras, bet jāmāk izbaudīt jauki laikapstākļi. Vecāki izlemj bērniem radīt jautras rotaļas ārā. Bet lomas un mīklas jādala uzmanīgi, lai nerodas pārsteīgumi.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbabravo noķer mistisku maskētu vandāli, kurš cenšas bēgt pēc mājas apzīmēšanas. Pie lietas ķeras detektīvs un doktors. // Barbabravo mīļākā mašīna pazūd no viesistabas. To meklējot Barbabravo, Barbabella un Barbagudrais zem dīvāna atrod dīvainu caurumu. Ja nu mašīna aizkrita līdz zemes centram?

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Ceļā uz Marsu Barbapapas sastop Barbamarsiešu ģimeni. Viņiem nav laika iepazīties, kad ciemam uzbrūk milzu augs.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Pilsētā ierodas fermere, kas lūdz Rabla komandu uzcelt kūti viņas cūciņai. Vai suņuki paspēs to paveikt līdz lielajai Rukšu ballei? Motores īpašā dzimšanas dienas dāvana aizkavējas, jo izrādās, ka Celtnieklīcim vajadzīgs lielāks skrejceļš.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Komanda ar Ķepu Patruļas Maršalu būvē pirmo ugunsdzēsības departamentu. Kad Maršala ugunsdzēsības mašīna tiek sabotēta, visi strādā kopā, lai nodzēstu uguni

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Bērniem ir garlaicīgi, jo ārā līst lietus. Bet vecāki zina, ka vajag tikai nedaudz iztēles, lai varētu izklaidēties aŗī lietū. Bērniem iztēle ir lieliska, varbūt pat pārāk... // Barbagudrais radīja dekoderi, kurš spēj iztulkot dzīvnieku skaņas, bet dzīvnieki fermā un pagalmā neko interesantu nesaka. Barbazū lūdz iztulkot okeāna iemītnieku valodu.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Vecākus pārsteidz aizvien vairāku reklāmas izkārtņu parādīšanās gar viņu ceļu. Gaisma no reklāmām ir tik spoža, ka naktī vairs nevar saskatīt zvaigznes un visur ir tik daudz stabu! Pietiks! Ģimenei jārīkojas! // Barbalala vēlas kļūt par kovbojmeiteni un Barbazū ir apņēmies viņai palīdzēt. Lai to panāktu, viņai jāiemācās aprūpēt govis un bulli. Tas nav viegli, bet, ja viņa pacentīsies, viņa būs lieliska kovbojmeitene.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims dara visu, lai tiktu pie jaunās Dinozvaigznes figūriņas. Ir Astro-joku diena, bet Tims nezina, kad apstāties. Timam un tētim jānoķer traucējošs kurmis.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad Megameistars izaicina mēru Greitveju piedalīties triku sacensībās, Rabla komanda būvē satriecošas triku rampas. Kad elektrības traucējumi apdraud Sjerras Spīdošās koncertu, ķepaiņi izmanto lielos braucamos, lai atgrieztu elektrību.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un viņa celtnieksuņu ģimene gatavojas būvēt tiltu, taču nelietīgajam Ātrmeistaram ir cita ideja. Rabla komandai jāstrādā kopā un jāizglābj visi, uzbūvējot jaunu, drošu tiltu uz Celtnieklīci.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora palīdz pelēnam Peresam salabot burvju zobu suku, lai varētu saņemt dāvanu par savu izkritušo zobu. Dora iepazīstas ar kāpuru Karlosu, kurš vēlas kļūt pr tauriņu! Lai tas notiktu, draugiem viņam jāatrod sviestogu cienasts.

programme.desc: Pēc sniegota pārsteiguma pienākšanas, Rabla komanda piedāvā palīdzēt Hedlija viesnīcā. Kad kāpnes izrādās nepietiekami ātras, ir laiks celt. Karls adoptē kaķēnus. Kad viņi izraisa popkorna elli, Rabla komanda padara kafejnīcu kaķēniem draudzīgu.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Pilsētas Čili Kūkarū ir apdraudēts, kad sāk iebrukt Rātsnama jumts! Par laimi suņi zina, kā to salabot.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Arvien jauni piedzīvojumi ar Doru! Piebiedrojies drošajai pētniecei Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu brīnumainajos piedzīvojumos - no došanās palīgā dzīvniekiem kopā ar Djego līdz apburtas nāru pasaules glābšanai.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Jauni piedzīvojumi ar DORU! Pievienojies drošajai pasaules pētītājai Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu kopīgajos ceļojumos pa maģisko lietusmežu, kurā var notikt - un notiek - brīnumu lietas. Lets go!

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs, Tija un omīte ir dārgumu meklējumos. Ir Rūkoņas svētki, un Tims grib, lai viņa rūciens ir labākais. Tims, Tomijs un Tija savā mājā atrod pazudušu mamutu.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Cūciņa Pepa ir mīļa, ziņkārīga un aktīva pirmsskolniece, kura kopā ar māmiņu, tēti un brālīti Džordžu ik dienu uzzina daudz ko jaunu un aizraujošu. Pepas iecienītākās nodarbes ir rotaļāšanās, pārģērbšanās un lēkāšana pa dubļainām peļķēm, un viņas jautrie piedzīvojumi vienmēr beidzas ar skaļiem smieklu rukšķiem.

programme.title: Haizivsuns
programme.desc: Haizivsuns nejauši izdzēš Maksa mammas darba video un kopā ar Maksu cenšas nofilmēt jaunu reportāžu ar komandas palīdzību.

programme.title: Haizivsuns
programme.desc: Haizivsunim apnīk, ka Miai ļoti patīk viņu ņurcīt. Viņš atrod Haizivsuņa rotaļlietu, bet ātri kļūst greizsirdīgs, kad Mia pievēršas mantiņai.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Pēc tam, kad Ātrmeistars uzbūvējis nedrošu rotaļlaukumu, Rabla komandai jādomā radoši un jāuzbūvē jauns laukums no veciem materiāliem. Pilsētas Čili Kūkarū ir apdraudēts, kad sāk iebrukt Rātsnama jumts! Par laimi suņi zina, kā to salabot.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Ātri jānomazgā Greitvejas dubļainais motocikls! Vīlers un suņi ķeras pie darba, lai uzbūvētu risinājumu pirms sacensībām. Vectēva Grants īpašā diena! Bet, kad nepieciešama suņu palīdzība, viņiem jāmaina vectēva dienas plāni.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Ceļojumā uz Parīzi ģimene apskatīs lielisko Luvru. Diemžēl Barbalala neievēro strikto noteikumu - muzejā neēst. // Barbalala strikti ievēro ačgārnās dienas tradīcijas, kas cēlušās no seniem laikiem. Brāļi un māsas pievienojas viņai ačgārnajā dienā.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs un Tija atrod pazudušu rotaļlietu un sola atgriezt to saimniekam. Kaja gaida, kad brauks ar Nebulatoru, bet Tims nav drošs. Tims un Kaja cenšas nofotografēt maldinošu Kosmosa vaboli.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims izliekas, lai pierādītu, ka ir tikpat foršs, cik Kajas brālēns.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora un Zābaciņš satiek vientuļniekvēzīti Šelliju, kura pazaudējusi savu čaulu un paslēpjas Zābaciņa zābakā. Dora dodas meklēt Šellijas mitekli. Tētis rīko kesadilju pikniku, bet ir aizmirsis mājās visas sastāvdaļas! Dora apņemas tās aizgādāt.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Zābaciņš grib paaugties lielāks, lai drīkstētu vizināties karuseļos - taču kļūst milzīgs! Dora viņam palīdz atgūt ierasto izmēru. Mugursomai ir īpaša dāvana Dorai, bet tā nevar atvērties! Draugi dodas lūgt palīdzību vecmāmiņai.

"Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Darbīga bebra dēļ Celtnieklīcī pazūd elektrība! Lai to atkal pieslēgtu, komandai jāuzceļ vaininiekam jauna mītne. Pilsētas palīgu gājiena dienā Ātrmeistars sabojā ceļu. Suņukiem ar steigu jālabo viņa kaitējums.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un viņa ķepaiņu celtnieku ģimene pārceļas uz kaimiņpilsētu Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, rotaļājas un būvē visu kopienai nepieciešamo.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbaliba, Barbalala un Barbabella pēc kārtas stāsta stāstu. Katra iekļauj tajā ko ļoti personīgu. Barbapapu ģimene pavada dienu pludmalē. Sadalījušies 2 komandās, barbabērni cīnās par smilšu pussalu.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs un Tija apmaldās izklaides centrā. Tims meklē jaunu, sev piemērotu raķeti. Kad Terija pieskata bērnus, Tims cenšas apiet visus noteikumus.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims cenšas dabūt lejā Tijas jauno balonu, kas ieķēries kokā.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Cūciņa Pepa ir mīļa, ziņkārīga un aktīva pirmsskolniece, kura kopā ar māmiņu, tēti un brālīti Džordžu ik dienu uzzina daudz ko jaunu un aizraujošu. Pepas iecienītākās nodarbes ir rotaļāšanās, pārģērbšanās un lēkāšana pa dubļainām peļķēm, un viņas jautrie piedzīvojumi vienmēr beidzas ar skaļiem smieklu rukšķiem.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Dora

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un suņi mēģina uzbūvēt lielu riteņu veikalu līdz Riteņu Festivālam... varbūt Ātrmeistars viņus apsteigs! Kad Motore atsakās iet vannā pirms ģimenes fotografēšanās, Rablam un suņiem jāatrod risinājums.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad vējaina diena traucē būvēt saldējuma veikalu, Rabls, Miksa un Čārdžers ķeras pie darba. Rātsnamā kaut kas mistiski čīkst. Mērs Greitveja lūdz Rablam un Čārdžeram to atrast un salabot pirms viņas runas.

programme.title: Victorious
programme.desc: Victorious tells the story of the sixteen year old Tori Vega. She grows up in the shadow of her older sister Trina, the big star of the family. But this suddenly changes as Tori attends Hollywood Arts, the best high school of performing arts. Soon she finds out that it is difficult to find her way and be accepted by her fellow students. While Tori is a great singer, dancer and actress, she doesnt realise it. Gradually she finds out that she is a true entertainer and very talented.

programme.title: Sam and Cat
programme.desc: Sam and Cat is an American teen sitcom, a crossover spin-off of both iCarly and Victorious. Sam and Cat meet under very uncommon circumstances, become friends and then roommates. They want to start their own business to be more independent and become part-time babysitters. Since then their lives have completely changed and are filled with all kinds of comic situations and various unbelievable and curious adventures, as looking after kids is not easy. Watch young charges playing mischievous tricks on Sam and Cat and have fun!

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Raphaels brothers just dont understand him. Not only does he NEED to fight, hes really good at it, or at least thats what his new boxing trainer named Spuds told him. Spuds even ENCOURAGES Raph to work out his anger and negativity through fighting, even if his family and the annoying Pigeon Pete dont get it. But although the Turtles dont see eye to eye, they must work together to stop a rampaging Rocksteady and Bebop from wrecking the city! Social media blew up with videos of the two Mutanimals going berserk, fighting each other without seeming to know what was going on around them. And all the while, doing some serious damage to the city! As the dust settles, is there someone behind the whole plot, pulling the strings?

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: All of Raphs wildest dreams are coming true in the underground Mutant Battle Arena! He gets to let loose, fighting the massive Mutanimals Bebop and Rocksteady; even the hug-loving Mondo Gecko joins in on the fun! Raph doesnt hold back, and he gets his butt kicked with a smile on his face. Not only that, hes getting some serious bling in exchange for being part of the fights - gold chains, new clothes, even his very own vehicle, the TURTLE TANK! This makes Donnie, Leo, and Mikey very suspicious, since Raph has kept everything a secret from them. But audiences love Raph, which pleases the crime boss Kitsune and her street gang, the Purple Dragons. They run the arena with the help of an obnoxious investor named Knox. But Raphs dream may become a nightmare, as Raph is oblivious to the fact that hes walked right into their trap!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.desc: Best and Bester are a pair of hilariously individual twins who live in a weird and wonderful alternate reality where your neighbour could be a pair of disgruntled trousers or your best friend a floating cloud of bottom burp. But, unlike their friends and neighbours, Best and Bester have the unique ability to choose a new body every single day and, in doing so, experience life in a completely different way.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Max and Phoebe start the process to impress Captain Perfect and save their mission, but they clash over their different styles. As Max sees that Phoebe worked better with Captain Perfect, he decides that he will also be better off with a new partner, and summons his friend Gideon from Hiddenville. Gideon doesnt fit the superhero mold, however, so Max uses one of his gadgets to give him size and strength. But the setting is off, and Max shrinks Gideon to the size of an ant, forcing him to locate and save his impossible-to-see friend before Phoebe and Captain Perfect discover what hes done. Meanwhile, Chloe asks Booch and Jinx to try their best to bond with new crush BC, so they pretend to be wealthy like his family.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Raphaels brothers just dont understand him. Not only does he NEED to fight, hes really good at it, or at least thats what his new boxing trainer named Spuds told him. Spuds even ENCOURAGES Raph to work out his anger and negativity through fighting, even if his family and the annoying Pigeon Pete dont get it. But although the Turtles dont see eye to eye, they must work together to stop a rampaging Rocksteady and Bebop from wrecking the city! Social media blew up with videos of the two Mutanimals going berserk, fighting each other without seeming to know what was going on around them. And all the while, doing some serious damage to the city! As the dust settles, is there someone behind the whole plot, pulling the strings?

programme.title: The Loud House
programme.desc: In this crowded and chaotic household, Lincoln Loud is the only boy among his ten sisters. With eleven children under one roof, things get a little bit crazy sometimes, to say the least. This childrens cartoon is fun and light-hearted, and Clyde, Lincolns best friend, only adds to that. Clyde is an only child by contrast, and is jealous of Lincolns abundance of siblings. Clyde also has a massive crush on Lori, who is Lincolns oldest sister. However, she has a boyfriend, Bobby. Bobby, although not being particularly intelligent, has several different jobs, ranging from life guard, to security at a shopping centre.
